13077352Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace StackOverflow.DemosDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string OutputFormat = "{0}: {1}";Di2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public Program()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SortedDictionary<string, int> dic = new SortedDictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("a", 1);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("b", 2);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("d", 2);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("c", 1);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("e", 1);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("f", 3);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("g", 4);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("h", 2);Di2015NewLine            dic.Add("i", 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OutputByKeyAsc(dic);Di2015NewLine            OutputByKeyDesc(dic);Di2015NewLine            OutputByValueFrequency(dic);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void OutputByKeyAsc(SortedDictionary<string, int> dic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("OutputByKeyAsc");Di2015NewLine            foreach (string key in dic.Keys)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, key, dic[key]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void OutputByKeyDesc(SortedDictionary<string, int> dic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("OutputByKeyDesc");Di2015NewLine            foreach (string key in dic.Keys.Reverse())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, key, dic[key]));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void OutputByValueFrequency(SortedDictionary<string, int> dic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("OutputByValueFrequency");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<int,int>> values = Di2015NewLine                (Di2015NewLine                    from sortedItem Di2015NewLine                    in Di2015NewLine                    (Di2015NewLine                        from entry Di2015NewLine                        in dic Di2015NewLine                        group entry Di2015NewLine                        by entry.ValueDi2015NewLine                        into resultDi2015NewLine                        select new KeyValuePair<int,int>(result.Key , result.Count())Di2015NewLine                    )Di2015NewLine                    orderby sortedItem.Value descendingDi2015NewLine                    select sortedItemDi2015NewLine                ).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<int, int> value in values)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> item in dic.Where<KeyValuePair<string, int>>(item => item.Value == value.Key))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, item.Key, string.Format(OutputFormat, item.Value, value.Value)));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13077352Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace StackOverflow.DemosDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string OutputFormat = "{0}: {1}";Di2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program("Another great story and another great adventure.");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public Program(string userInput)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //break string into wordsDi2015NewLine            IEnumerable<IGrouping<string, int>> words = Regex.Split(userInput, @"\\W+").GroupBy(word => word.ToLowerInvariant(), word => 1); //nb converting word to lower case to avoid case sensitive comparisons in grouping - I can keep the original value(s) by replacing "word => 1" with "word => word" if neededDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\nWords in alphabetic order");Di2015NewLine            foreach (IGrouping<string, int> wordInfo in words.OrderBy(word => word.Key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, wordInfo.Key,wordInfo.Count()));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\nWords in descending alphabetic order");Di2015NewLine            foreach (IGrouping<string, int> wordInfo in words.OrderByDescending(word => word.Key))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Count()));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\nWords by frequency (desc)");Di2015NewLine            foreach (IGrouping<string, int> wordInfo in words.OrderByDescending(word => word.Count()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Count()));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13077352Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace StackOverflow.DemosDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string OutputFormat = "{0}: {1}";Di2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program("Another great story and another great adventure.");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public Program(string userInput)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WordCounter myWordCounter = new WordCounter(userInput);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\n**Alphabetical**");Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> wordInfo in myWordCounter.GetWordCountByWordAlphabeticalDesc())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat,wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\n**Alphabetical Desc**");Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> wordInfo in myWordCounter.GetWordCountByWordAlphabeticalDesc())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\n**Frequency Desc**");Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> wordInfo in myWordCounter.GetWordCountByFrequency())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(string.Format(OutputFormat, wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class WordCounterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string sentance;Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<IGrouping<string, int>> words;Di2015NewLine        public WordCounter(string sentance)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.sentance = sentance;Di2015NewLine            GetWords();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        void GetWords()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.words = Regex.Split(this.sentance, @"\\W+").GroupBy(word => word.ToLowerInvariant(), word => 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, int>> GetWordCountByWordAlphabetical()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.words.OrderBy(word => word.Key).Select(wordInfo => new KeyValuePair<string,int>(wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Count()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, int>> GetWordCountByWordAlphabeticalDesc()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.words.OrderByDescending(word => word.Key).Select(wordInfo => new KeyValuePair<string, int>(wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Count()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, int>> GetWordCountByFrequency()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.words.OrderByDescending(word => word.Count()).Select(wordInfo => new KeyValuePair<string, int>(wordInfo.Key, wordInfo.Count()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13079417Di2015UniqueSeparatorC#
13079417Di2015UniqueSeparatordll
13079417Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MachineType type = GetDllMachineType("path/to/MyAssembly.dll");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (type.Equals(MachineType.IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386)) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Dll architecture: x86/32bit");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (type.Equals(MachineType.IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_IA64)) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Dll architecture: x64/64bit");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static MachineType GetDllMachineType(string dllPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //see http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/system/platform/firmware/PECOFF.mspxDi2015NewLine            //offset to PE header is always at 0x3CDi2015NewLine            //PE header starts with "PE\\0\\0" =  0x50 0x45 0x00 0x00Di2015NewLine            //followed by 2-byte machine type field (see document above for enum)Di2015NewLine            FileStream fs = new FileStream(dllPath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine            BinaryReader br = new BinaryReader(fs);Di2015NewLine            fs.Seek(0x3c, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            Int32 peOffset = br.ReadInt32();Di2015NewLine            fs.Seek(peOffset, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            UInt32 peHead = br.ReadUInt32();Di2015NewLine            if (peHead != 0x00004550) // "PE\\0\\0", little-endianDi2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Can't find PE header");Di2015NewLine            MachineType machineType = (MachineType)br.ReadUInt16();Di2015NewLine            br.Close();Di2015NewLine            fs.Close();Di2015NewLine            return machineType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public enum MachineType : ushortDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_UNKNOWN = 0x0,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_AM33 = 0x1d3,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_AMD64 = 0x8664,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_ARM = 0x1c0,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_EBC = 0xebc,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386 = 0x14c,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_IA64 = 0x200,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_M32R = 0x9041,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_MIPS16 = 0x266,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_MIPSFPU = 0x366,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_MIPSFPU16 = 0x466,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_POWERPC = 0x1f0,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_POWERPCFP = 0x1f1,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_R4000 = 0x166,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_SH3 = 0x1a2,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_SH3DSP = 0x1a3,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_SH4 = 0x1a6,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_SH5 = 0x1a8,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_THUMB = 0x1c2,Di2015NewLine            IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_WCEMIPSV2 = 0x169,Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // returns true if the dll is 64-bit, false if 32-bit, and null if unknownDi2015NewLine        public static bool? UnmanagedDllIs64Bit(string dllPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (GetDllMachineType(dllPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case MachineType.IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_AMD64:Di2015NewLine                case MachineType.IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_IA64:Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                case MachineType.IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386:Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13079985Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string baseUri = Di2015NewLine  "http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/geocode/xml?latlng={0},{1}&sensor=false";Di2015NewLinestring location = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void RetrieveFormatedAddress(string lat, string lng)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string requestUri = string.Format(baseUri, lat, lng);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (WebClient wc = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string result = wc.DownloadString(requestUri);Di2015NewLine        var xmlElm = XElement.Parse(result);Di2015NewLine        var status = (from elm in xmlElm.Descendants() where Di2015NewLine            elm.Name == "status" select elm).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        if (status.Value.ToLower() == "ok")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var res = (from elm in xmlElm.Descendants() where Di2015NewLine                elm.Name == "formatted_address" select elm).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine            requestUri = res.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13080892Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Coordinates : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Coordinates(double x, double y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        X = x;Di2015NewLine        Y = y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public Coordinates()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        X = 0;Di2015NewLine        Y = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //X Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine    public double XDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (double)GetValue(XProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(XProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty XProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("X", typeof(double), typeof(Coordinates), new UIPropertyMetadata(0d));Di2015NewLine    //Y Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine    public double YDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (double)GetValue(YProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(YProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty YProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("Y", typeof(double), typeof(Coordinates), new UIPropertyMetadata(0d));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13080892Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConnectorLocationConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var start = (Coordinates)values[0];Di2015NewLine        var end = (Coordinates)values[1];Di2015NewLine        return new Thickness(start.X, start.Y, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class ConnectorAngleConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var start = (Coordinates)values[0];Di2015NewLine        var end = (Coordinates)values[1];Di2015NewLine        //dy/dx = tan(t) => t = arcTan(dy/dx)Di2015NewLine        double t = Math.Atan2(Di2015NewLine                    Math.Abs(start.Y - end.Y),Di2015NewLine                    Math.Abs(start.X - end.X)) * 180 / Math.PI;Di2015NewLine        if (end.X <= start.X && end.Y >= start.Y) return 180 - t;Di2015NewLine        if (end.X >= start.X && end.Y <= start.Y) return -t;Di2015NewLine        if (end.X <= start.X && end.Y <= start.Y) return 180 + t;Di2015NewLine        return t;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class ConnectorWidthConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var start = (Coordinates)values[0];Di2015NewLine        var end = (Coordinates)values[1];Di2015NewLine        //get side for statesDi2015NewLine        return Math.Abs(start.X - end.X);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class ConnectorHeightConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var start = (Coordinates)values[0];Di2015NewLine        var end = (Coordinates)values[1];Di2015NewLine        //get side for statesDi2015NewLine        return Math.Abs(start.Y - end.Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13082738Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass GermanEncoding : Encoding {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static readonly Encoding iso88791Encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static readonly Dictionary<Char, Char> charMappingTable = new Dictionary<Char, Char> {Di2015NewLine    { '', 'A' },Di2015NewLine    { '?', 'A' },Di2015NewLine    { '', 'A' },Di2015NewLine    { '', 'c' },Di2015NewLine    // Add more mappingsDi2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static readonly Dictionary<Byte, Byte> byteMappingTable = charMappingTableDi2015NewLine    .ToDictionary(kvp => MapCharToByte(kvp.Key), kvp => MapCharToByte(kvp.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 GetByteCount(Char[] chars, Int32 index, Int32 count) {Di2015NewLine    return iso88791Encoding.GetByteCount(chars, index, count);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 GetBytes(Char[] chars, Int32 charIndex, Int32 charCount, Byte[] bytes, Int32 byteIndex) {Di2015NewLine    var count = iso88791Encoding.GetBytes(chars, charIndex, charCount, bytes, byteIndex);Di2015NewLine    for (var i = byteIndex; i < byteIndex + count; ++i)Di2015NewLine      if (byteMappingTable.ContainsKey(bytes[i]))Di2015NewLine        bytes[i] = byteMappingTable[bytes[i]];Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 GetCharCount(Byte[] bytes, Int32 index, Int32 count) {Di2015NewLine    return iso88791Encoding.GetCharCount(bytes, index, count);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 GetChars(Byte[] bytes, Int32 byteIndex, Int32 byteCount, Char[] chars, Int32 charIndex) {Di2015NewLine    return iso88791Encoding.GetChars(bytes, byteIndex, byteCount, chars, charIndex);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 GetMaxByteCount(Int32 charCount) {Di2015NewLine    return iso88791Encoding.GetMaxByteCount(charCount);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 GetMaxCharCount(Int32 byteCount) {Di2015NewLine    return iso88791Encoding.GetMaxCharCount(byteCount);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static Byte MapCharToByte(Char c) {Di2015NewLine    // NOTE: Assumes that each character encodes as a single byte.Di2015NewLine    return iso88791Encoding.GetBytes(new[] { c })[0];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

GetHandler(System.Reflection.EventInfo ev) {Di2015NewLine    string name = ev.Name;Di2015NewLine    // create an array of ParameterExpressionsDi2015NewLine    // to pass to the Expression.Lambda method so we generateDi2015NewLine    // a handler method with the correct signature.Di2015NewLine    var parameters = ev.EventHandlerType.GetMethod("Invoke").GetParameters().Di2015NewLine      Select((p, i) => Expression.Parameter(p.ParameterType, "p" + i)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this and the Compile() can be turned into a one-liner, I'm justDi2015NewLine    // splitting it here so you can see the lambda code in the ConsoleDi2015NewLine    // Note that we use the Event's type for the lambda, so it's tightly boundDi2015NewLine    // to that event.Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda(ev.EventHandlerType,Di2015NewLine      Expression.Call(typeof(Console).GetMethod(Di2015NewLine        "WriteLine",Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static,Di2015NewLine        null,Di2015NewLine        new[] { typeof(string) },Di2015NewLine        null), Expression.Constant(name + " was fired!")), parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //spit the lambda out (for bragging rights)Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine      "Compiling dynamic lambda {0} for event \\"{1}\\"", lambda, name);Di2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //note - an unsubscribe might be handy - which would meanDi2015NewLine  //caching all the events that were subscribed for this objectDi2015NewLine  //and the handler.  Probably makes more sense to turn this typeDi2015NewLine  //into an instance type that binds to a single object...Di2015NewLine  public static void SubscribeAllEvents(object o){Di2015NewLine    foreach(var e in o.GetType().GetEvents())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      e.AddEventHandler(o, GetHandler(e));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void TestSubscribe()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  TestWithEvents testObj = new TestWithEvents();Di2015NewLine  DynamicEventBinder.SubscribeAllEvents(testObj);Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("Raising events...");Di2015NewLine  testObj.RaiseEvents();Di2015NewLine  //check the console outputDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13083397Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void DumpExpression(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    Walk(expression, sb);Di2015NewLine    string s = sb.ToString();      Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic object Evaluate(Expression expr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (expr.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine            return ((ConstantExpression)expr).Value;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine            var me = (MemberExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            object target = Evaluate(me.Expression);Di2015NewLine            switch (me.Member.MemberType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Field:Di2015NewLine                    return ((FieldInfo)me.Member).GetValue(target);Di2015NewLine                case System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Property:Di2015NewLine                    return ((PropertyInfo)me.Member).GetValue(target, null);Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    throw new NotSupportedException(me.Member.MemberType.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException(expr.NodeType.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void Walk(Expression expr, StringBuilder output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (expr.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.New:Di2015NewLine            var ne = (NewExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            var ctor = ne.Constructor;Di2015NewLine            output.Append(" a new ").Append(ctor.DeclaringType.Name);Di2015NewLine            if(ne.Arguments != null && ne.Arguments.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var parameters = ctor.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine                for(int i = 0 ;i < ne.Arguments.Count ; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Append(i == 0 ? " with " : ", ")Di2015NewLine                          .Append(parameters[i].Name).Append(" =");Di2015NewLine                    Walk(ne.Arguments[i], output);Di2015NewLine                }                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Lambda:Di2015NewLine            Walk(((LambdaExpression)expr).Body, output);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Call:Di2015NewLine            var mce = (MethodCallExpression)expr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (mce.Method.DeclaringType == typeof(Evaluator))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object target = Evaluate(mce.Object);Di2015NewLine                output.Append(" call ").Append(((Evaluator)target).Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(" call ").Append(mce.Method.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (mce.Object != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(" on");Di2015NewLine                Walk(mce.Object, output);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (mce.Arguments != null && mce.Arguments.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var parameters = mce.Method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < mce.Arguments.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Append(i == 0 ? " with " : ", ")Di2015NewLine                            .Append(parameters[i].Name).Append(" =");Di2015NewLine                    Walk(mce.Arguments[i], output);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.MemberInit:Di2015NewLine            var mei = (MemberInitExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            Walk(mei.NewExpression, output);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var member in mei.Bindings)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch(member.BindingType) {Di2015NewLine                    case MemberBindingType.Assignment:Di2015NewLine                        output.Append(" set ").Append(member.Member.Name)Di2015NewLine                            .Append(" to:");Di2015NewLine                        Walk(((MemberAssignment)member).Expression, output);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        throw new NotSupportedException(member.BindingType.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine            var ce = (ConstantExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            if (Attribute.IsDefined(ce.Type, typeof(CompilerGeneratedAttribute)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(" capture-context");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Append(" ").Append(((ConstantExpression)expr).Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine            var me = (MemberExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            output.Append(" get ").Append(me.Member.Name).Append(" from");Di2015NewLine            if (me.Expression == null)Di2015NewLine            { // staticDi2015NewLine                output.Append(me.Member.DeclaringType.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Walk(me.Expression, output);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Parameter:Di2015NewLine            var pe = (ParameterExpression)expr;Di2015NewLine            output.Append(" @").Append(pe.Name);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException(expr.NodeType.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13084296Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class Program {Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sets = new SetCombiner<int> {Di2015NewLine            {1,2},{3,4},{2,4},{9,10},{9,12}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        sets.Combine();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var set in sets)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // edited for unity: original implementationDi2015NewLine            // Console.WriteLine("{" +Di2015NewLine            //    string.Join(",", set.OrderBy(x => x)) + "}");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            foreach(int i in set.OrderBy(x => x)) {Di2015NewLine                if(sb.Length != 0) sb.Append(',');Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{" + sb + "}");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass SetCombiner<T> : List<HashSet<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Add(params T[] values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Add(new HashSet<T>(values));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void Combine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int priorCount;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            priorCount = this.Count;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i >= Count) continue; // watch we haven't removedDi2015NewLine                int formed = i;Di2015NewLine                for (int j = formed - 1; j >= 0; j--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (this[formed].Any(this[j].Contains))Di2015NewLine                    { // an intersection exists; merge and removeDi2015NewLine                        this[j].UnionWith(this[formed]);Di2015NewLine                        this.RemoveAt(formed);Di2015NewLine                        formed = j;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (priorCount != this.Count); // making progressDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13084356Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction CompareDateValidatorClient(sender, args) {Di2015NewLine    var fromValue = document.getElementById('<%=txtGeneratedFrom.ClientID%>').value;Di2015NewLine    var toValue = document.getElementById('<%=txtGeneratedTo.ClientID%>').value;Di2015NewLine    var isValid = false;Di2015NewLine    if (ValidateDate(fromValue)) {Di2015NewLine        if (ValidateDate(toValue)) {Di2015NewLine            if (Date.parse(toValue) > Date.parse(fromValue)) {Di2015NewLine                isValid = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                sender.innerHTML = "'End' date cannot fall before 'Start' date.";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            sender.innerHTML = "To date should be in (mm/dd/yyyy) format.";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        sender.innerHTML = "From date should be in (mm/dd/yyyy) format.";Di2015NewLine    args.IsValid = isValid;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunction ValidateDate(str) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var rm_date = /^(0[1-9]|1[012])[- /.](0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])[- /.](19|20)\\d\\d$/;Di2015NewLine    //triple check for not empty, mm/dd/yyyy format and whether the date is validDi2015NewLine    return (str.trim() !== "" && str.match(rm_date) && !isNaN(Date.parse(str)));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//remedial javascript. trim functionDi2015NewLineif (!String.prototype.trim) {Di2015NewLine    String.prototype.trim = function () {Di2015NewLine        return this.replace(/^\\s*(\\S*(?:\\s+\\S+)*)\\s*$/, "$1");Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ControlToValidate property supports hooking up single element. 13088968Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class Bus<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Dictionary<object, Action<object, T>> Subscriptions = new Dictionary<object, Action<object, T>>();Di2015NewLine    public static void Raise(object sender, T message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Action<object, T> action in Subscriptions.Values)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action(sender, message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Subscribe(object subscriber, Action<object, T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Subscriptions[subscriber] = action;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Unsubscribe(object subscriber)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Subscriptions.ContainsKey(subscriber))Di2015NewLine            Subscriptions.Remove(subscriber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WasModified { }Di2015NewLine

13088969Di2015UniqueSeparatorColumnwidthChanging
13088969Di2015UniqueSeparator        private void listView1_ColumnWidthChanging(object sender, ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ListView lv = (ListView)sender;Di2015NewLine            int widthDifference = Math.Abs(lv.Columns[ e.ColumnIndex].Width - e.NewWidth);Di2015NewLine            if( widthDifference>2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int maxWidth = 0;Di2015NewLine                Graphics g = lv.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLine                for(int i = 0;i<lv.Items.Count;i++) Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string text = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                    if (e.ColumnIndex == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        text = lv.Items[i].Text;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        text = lv.Items[i].SubItems[e.ColumnIndex - 1].Text;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    SizeF sizeF = g.MeasureString(text, lv.Font);Di2015NewLine                    if (maxWidth < (int)(sizeF.Width + 0.5))Di2015NewLine                        maxWidth = (int)(sizeF.Width + 0.5);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                e.NewWidth = maxWidth;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13089078Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T>
13089078Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Cache<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new CacheEnumerator<T>(source);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class CacheEnumerator<T> : IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private CacheEntry<T> cacheEntry;Di2015NewLine    public CacheEnumerator(IEnumerable<T> sequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cacheEntry = new CacheEntry<T>();Di2015NewLine        cacheEntry.Sequence = sequence.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        cacheEntry.CachedValues = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (cacheEntry.FullyPopulated)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return cacheEntry.CachedValues.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return iterateSequence<T>(cacheEntry).GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<T> iterateSequence<T>(CacheEntry<T> entry)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; entry.ensureItemAt(i); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return entry.CachedValues[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class CacheEntry<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool FullyPopulated { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> Sequence { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //storing it as object, but the underlying objects will be lists of various generic types.Di2015NewLine    public List<T> CachedValues { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object key = new object();Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Ensure that the cache has an item a the provided index.  If not, take an item from the Di2015NewLine    /// input sequence and move to the cache.Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// The method is thread safe.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>True if the cache already had enough items or Di2015NewLine    /// an item was moved to the cache, Di2015NewLine    /// false if there were no more items in the sequence.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public bool ensureItemAt(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if the cache already has the items we don't need to lock to know we Di2015NewLine        //can get itDi2015NewLine        if (index < CachedValues.Count)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        //if we're done there's no race conditions hwere eitherDi2015NewLine        if (FullyPopulated)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //re-check the early-exit conditions in case they changed while we wereDi2015NewLine            //waiting on the lock.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //we already have the cached itemDi2015NewLine            if (index < CachedValues.Count)Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            //we don't have the cached item and there are no uncached itemsDi2015NewLine            if (FullyPopulated)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //we actually need to get the next item from the sequence.Di2015NewLine            if (Sequence.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CachedValues.Add(Sequence.Current);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Sequence.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                FullyPopulated = true;Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13089078Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<int> interestingIntGenertionMethod(int maxValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < maxValue; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("actually generating value: {0}", i);Di2015NewLine        yield return i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<int> sequence = interestingIntGenertionMethod(10)Di2015NewLine        .Cache();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int numThreads = 3;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numThreads; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int taskID = i;Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (int value in sequence)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Task: {0} Value:{1}",Di2015NewLine                    taskID, value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Press any key to exit...");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13090484Di2015UniqueSeparatorMaxBy
13090484Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource MaxBy<TSource, TKey>(this IEnumerable<TSource> sourceDi2015NewLine    , Func<TSource, TKey> selectorDi2015NewLine    , IComparer<TKey> comparer = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (comparer == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        comparer = Comparer<TKey>.Default;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<TSource> iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Source was empty");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TSource maxItem = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine        TKey maxValue = selector(maxItem);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TKey nextValue = selector(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            if (comparer.Compare(nextValue, maxValue) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxValue = nextValue;Di2015NewLine                maxItem = iterator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return maxItem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13092254Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.Xna.Framework;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace SimpleAnimationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class BodyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Model bodyModel;Di2015NewLine        ModelBone headBone;Di2015NewLine        ModelBone bodyBone;Di2015NewLine        Matrix headTransform;Di2015NewLine        Matrix bodyTransform;Di2015NewLine        Matrix[] boneTransforms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Body()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HeadScale = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Load(ContentManager content)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Load the tank model from the ContentManager.Di2015NewLine            bodyModel = content.Load<Model>("body");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Look up shortcut references to the bones we are going to animate.Di2015NewLine            headBone = bodyModel.Bones["head"];Di2015NewLine            bodyBone = bodyModel.Bones["body"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Store the original transform matrix for each animating bone.Di2015NewLine            headTransform = headBone.Transform;Di2015NewLine            bodyTransform = bodyBone.Transform;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Allocate the transform matrix array.Di2015NewLine            boneTransforms = new Matrix[bodyModel.Bones.Count];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Draw(Matrix world, Matrix view, Matrix projection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Set the world matrix as the root transform of the model.Di2015NewLine            bodyModel.Root.Transform = world;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Calculate matrices based on the current animation position.Di2015NewLine            Matrix headRotation = Matrix.CreateRotationX(HeadRotation);Di2015NewLine            Matrix headScale = Matrix.CreateScale(HeadScale);Di2015NewLine            Matrix bodyRotation = Matrix.CreateRotationX(BodyRotation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Apply matrices to the relevant bones.Di2015NewLine            headBone.Transform = headScale * headRotation * headTransform;Di2015NewLine            bodyBone.Transform = bodyRotation * bodyTransform;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Look up combined bone matrices for the entire model.Di2015NewLine            bodyModel.CopyAbsoluteBoneTransformsTo(boneTransforms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the model.Di2015NewLine            foreach (ModelMesh mesh in bodyModel.Meshes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (BasicEffect effect in mesh.Effects)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    effect.World = boneTransforms[mesh.ParentBone.Index];Di2015NewLine                    effect.View = view;Di2015NewLine                    effect.Projection = projection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    effect.EnableDefaultLighting();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                mesh.Draw();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public float HeadRotation { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public float HeadScale { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public float BodyRotation { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13097757Di2015UniqueSeparatorReceiveTimeout
13097757Di2015UniqueSeparatoryourTcpClient.Client.ReceiveTimeout
13097757Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring SendCmd(string cmd, string ip, int port)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var client = new TcpClient(ip, port);Di2015NewLine  var data = Encoding.GetEncoding(1252).GetBytes(cmd);Di2015NewLine  var stm = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLine  stm.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine  byte[] resp = new byte[2048];Di2015NewLine  var memStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine  var bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine  client.Client.ReceiveTimeout = 20;Di2015NewLine  doDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          bytes = stm.Read(resp, 0, resp.Length);Di2015NewLine          memStream.Write(resp, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (IOException ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          // if the ReceiveTimeout is reached an IOException will be raised...Di2015NewLine          // with an InnerException of type SocketException and ErrorCode 10060Di2015NewLine          var socketExept = ex.InnerException as SocketException;Di2015NewLine          if (socketExept == null || socketExept.ErrorCode != 10060)Di2015NewLine              // if it's not the "expected" exception, let's not hide the errorDi2015NewLine              throw ex;Di2015NewLine          // if it is the receive timeout, then reading endedDi2015NewLine          bytes = 0;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine  } while (bytes > 0);Di2015NewLine  return Encoding.GetEncoding(1252).GetString(memStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13098158Di2015UniqueSeparatorCheckForUpdate()
13098158Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void CheckForUpdate() {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                ApplicationDeployment updateCheck = ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment;Di2015NewLine                UpdateCheckInfo info = updateCheck.CheckForDetailedUpdate();Di2015NewLine                if(info.UpdateAvailable) {Di2015NewLine                    updateCheck.Update();Di2015NewLine                    WasUpdated = true;Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show( "The application has been upgraded, and will now restart." );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } catch(DeploymentDownloadException ex) {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show( "Automatic Update Failed.  Error: " + ex );Di2015NewLine            } catch(InvalidDeploymentException ex) {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show( "Automatic Update Failed.  Error: " + ex );Di2015NewLine            } catch(DeploymentException ex) {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show( "Automatic Update Failed.  Error: " + ex );Di2015NewLine            } catch(Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show( "Automatic Update Failed.  Error: " + ex );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13111854Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void listener()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine  TcpListener tcpListener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, 30000);Di2015NewLine  tcpListener.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  TcpClient tcpClient = tcpListener.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine  NetworkStream clientStream = tcpClient.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte[] message = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine  int bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  while (true)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //blocks until a client sends a messageDi2015NewLine      bytesRead = clientStream.Read(message, 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //a socket error has occuredDi2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (bytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //the client has disconnected from the serverDi2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //message has successfully been receivedDi2015NewLine    ASCIIEncoding encoder = new ASCIIEncoding();Di2015NewLine    Console.Write(encoder.GetString(message, 0, bytesRead));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  tcpClient.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13113901Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IJsonLinkableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Id { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass JsonRefConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson (JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteValue(((IJsonLinkable)value).Id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson (JsonReader reader, Type type, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.TokenType != JsonToken.String)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Ref value must be a string.");Di2015NewLine        return JsonLinkedContext.GetLinkedValue(serializer, type, reader.Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert (Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.IsAssignableFrom(typeof(IJsonLinkable));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass JsonRefedConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson (JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        serializer.Serialize(writer, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson (JsonReader reader, Type type, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var jo = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLine        var value = JsonLinkedContext.GetLinkedValue(serializer, type, (string)jo.PropertyValues().First());Di2015NewLine        serializer.Populate(jo.CreateReader(), value);Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert (Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return type.IsAssignableFrom(typeof(IJsonLinkable));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13113901Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass JsonLinkedContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IDictionary<Type, IDictionary<string, object>> links = new Dictionary<Type, IDictionary<string, object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static object GetLinkedValue (JsonSerializer serializer, Type type, string reference)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var context = (JsonLinkedContext)serializer.Context.Context;Di2015NewLine        IDictionary<string, object> links;Di2015NewLine        if (!context.links.TryGetValue(type, out links))Di2015NewLine            context.links[type] = links = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine        object value;Di2015NewLine        if (!links.TryGetValue(reference, out value))Di2015NewLine            links[reference] = value = FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject(type);Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13114570Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Sub GetSilenceLength(ByVal file As String, ByVal threshold As Long, ByRef startp As Long, ByRef endp As Long)Di2015NewLine   Dim buf(50000) As IntegerDi2015NewLine   Dim count As Long, pos As LongDi2015NewLine   Dim chan As LongDi2015NewLine   Dim a As Long, b As LongDi2015NewLine   Dim c As Long, d As LongDi2015NewLine   count = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   chan = BASS_StreamCreateFile(BASSFALSE, file, 0, 0, BASS_STREAM_DECODE) 'create decoding channelDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   If (chan = 0) Then Exit SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   DoDi2015NewLine         b = BASS_ChannelGetData(chan, buf(0), 20000) 'decode some dataDi2015NewLine         b = b / 2 'bytes -> samplesDi2015NewLine         a = 0Di2015NewLine         Do      'count silent samplesDi2015NewLine               a = a + 1Di2015NewLine         Loop While ((a < b) And (Abs(buf(a)) <= threshold))Di2015NewLine         count = count + (a * 2)Di2015NewLine         If (a < b) Then 'sound has bagunDi2015NewLine               'move back to a quieter sample (to avoid "click")Di2015NewLine               DoDi2015NewLine                     a = a - 1Di2015NewLine                     count = count - 2Di2015NewLine               Loop While ((a) And (Abs(buf(a)) > threshold / 4))Di2015NewLine               Exit DoDi2015NewLine         End IfDi2015NewLine   Loop While (BASS_ChannelIsActive(chan))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   startp = countDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   pos = BASS_StreamGetLength(chan)Di2015NewLine   DoDi2015NewLine         pos = IIf(pos < 100000, 0, pos - 100000) 'step back a bitDi2015NewLine         BASS_ChannelSetPosition chan, posDi2015NewLine         d = BASS_ChannelGetData(chan, buf(0), 100000) ' decode some dataDi2015NewLine         d = d / 2 'bytes -> samplesDi2015NewLine         c = dDi2015NewLine         DoDi2015NewLine               c = c - 1  'count silent samplesDi2015NewLine         Loop While (c > 0) And (Abs(buf(c)) <= threshold / 2) 'Here is the correctionDi2015NewLine         If (c > 0) Then   'sound has begunDi2015NewLine               count = pos + c * 2Di2015NewLine               Exit DoDi2015NewLine         End IfDi2015NewLine   Loop While (pos > count)Di2015NewLine   endp = countDi2015NewLine   BASS_StreamFree (chan)Di2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

13118110Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<ICD_Map2, string> maps = new Dictionary<ICD_Map2, string> {Di2015NewLine        {new ICD_Map2 ("Mobile SMS", "Australia"),"Local Text"},Di2015NewLine        {new ICD_Map2 ("Mobile SMS", "International"),"International Text"}Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // try forwards lookupDi2015NewLine    var key = new ICD_Map2("Mobile SMS", "Australia");Di2015NewLine    string result;Di2015NewLine    if (maps.TryGetValue(key, out result))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("found: " + result);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // try reverse lookup (less efficient)Di2015NewLine    result = "International Text";Di2015NewLine    key = (from pair in mapsDi2015NewLine               where pair.Value == resultDi2015NewLine               select pair.Key).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (key != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("found: " + key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13122244Di2015UniqueSeparatorIPEndPoint ip = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("127.0.0.1"), 9999);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Socket server = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork,SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     server.Connect(ip); //Connect to the serverDi2015NewLine  } catch (SocketException e){Di2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine("Unable to connect to server.");Di2015NewLine     return;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("Type 'exit' to exit.");Di2015NewLine  while(true)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     string input = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine     if (input == "exit")Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine     server.Send(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(input)); //Encode from user's input, send the dataDi2015NewLine     byte[] data = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine     int receivedDataLength = server.Receive(data); //Wait for the dataDi2015NewLine     string stringData = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(data, 0, receivedDataLength); //Decode the data receivedDi2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine(stringData); //Write the data on the screenDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  server.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Both);Di2015NewLine  server.Close();Di2015NewLine

13125095Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Loads the history for a fileDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="filePath">Path to file</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>List of version history</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic List<IVersionHistory> LoadHistory(string filePath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LibGit2Sharp.Repository repo = new Repository(this.pathToRepo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string path = filePath.Replace(this.pathToRepo.Replace(System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar + ".git", string.Empty), string.Empty).Substring(1);Di2015NewLine    List<IVersionHistory> list = new List<IVersionHistory>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Commit commit in repo.Head.Commits)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.TreeContainsFile(commit.Tree, path) && list.Count(x => x.Date == commit.Author.When) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            list.Add(new GitCommit() { Author = commit.Author.Name, Date = commit.Author.When, Message = commit.MessageShort} as IVersionHistory);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Checks a GIT tree to see if a file existsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="tree">The GIT tree</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="filename">The file name</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>true if file exists</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate bool TreeContainsFile(Tree tree, string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (tree.Any(x => x.Path == filename))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Tree branch in tree.Where(x => x.Type == GitObjectType.Tree).Select(x => x.Target as Tree))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (this.TreeContainsFile(branch, filename))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13127238Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToBinaryString(byte[] array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var s = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (byte b in array)Di2015NewLine        s.append(Convert.ToString(b, 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return s.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13127238Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] FromBinaryString(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = s.Length / 8;Di2015NewLine    var b = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        b[i] = Convert.ToByte(s.Substring(i * 8, 8), 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13133545Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InternetExplorerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // List of URL objectsDi2015NewLine    public List<URL> URLs { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<URL> GetHistory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Initiate main objectDi2015NewLine        UrlHistoryWrapperClass urlhistory = new UrlHistoryWrapperClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enumerate URLs in HistoryDi2015NewLine        UrlHistoryWrapperClass.STATURLEnumerator enumerator =Di2015NewLine        urlhistory.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Iterate through the enumerationDi2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Obtain URL and TitleDi2015NewLine            string url = enumerator.Current.URL.Replace('\\'', ' ');Di2015NewLine            // In the title, eliminate single quotes to avoid confusionDi2015NewLine            string title = string.IsNullOrEmpty(enumerator.Current.Title)Di2015NewLine            ? enumerator.Current.Title.Replace('\\'', ' ') : "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create new entryDi2015NewLine            URL U = new URL(url, title, "Internet Explorer");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add entry to listDi2015NewLine            URLs.Add(U);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // OptionalDi2015NewLine        enumerator.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Clear URL HistoryDi2015NewLine        urlhistory.ClearHistory();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return URLs;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13134040Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool CompareTables(Table source, Table destination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Column count doesn't matchDi2015NewLine    if (!source.Columns.Count.Equals(destination.Columns.Count))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assuming the order of the Columns are same in both the TablesDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < source.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        if (!source.Columns[i].Equals(destination.Columns[i]))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Constraints count doesn't matchDi2015NewLine    if (!source.Checks.Count.Equals(destination.Checks.Count))Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Assuming the order of the Contraints are same in both the TablesDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < source.Checks.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        if (!source.Checks[i].Equals(destination.Checks[i]))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13138358Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UserAuthenticationInvoker : IOperationInvoker {Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///     The original operation invoker.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private readonly IOperationInvoker _originalInvoker;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Type _responseType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly IUserService _userService;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SupplierAuthenticationInvoker(IOperationInvoker originalInvoker, Type responseType, IUserService userService) {Di2015NewLine        _originalInvoker = originalInvoker;Di2015NewLine        _responseType = responseType;Di2015NewLine        _userService = userService;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Implementation of IOperationInvoker {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] AllocateInputs() {Di2015NewLine        return _originalInvoker.AllocateInputs();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Invoke(object instance, object[] inputs, out object[] outputs) {Di2015NewLine        // Validate base objects requestDi2015NewLine        if(!(inputs[0] is BaseOperationRequest)) throw new ArgumentException("The request object must inherit from BaseOperationRequest in order for user authentication to take place.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dynamic response = Activator.CreateInstance(_responseType);Di2015NewLine        if(!(response is BaseOperationResponse)) throw new InvalidOperationException("The response object must inherit from BaseOperationResponsein order for user authentication to take place.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var req = (BaseOperationRequest)inputs[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Authenticate the userDi2015NewLine        var authResult = _userService.AuthenticateUser(new AuthenticateUserRequest {Di2015NewLine            Token = req.Token,Di2015NewLine            Password = req.PasswordDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(!authResult.Success) {Di2015NewLine            // Authentication failed, return reflected response object.Di2015NewLine            outputs = new object[0];Di2015NewLine            // Set response headersDi2015NewLine            response.Success = false;Di2015NewLine            response.ErrorCode = ServiceErrors.AuthErrorInvalidTokenOrPassword;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return response;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Authentication success, set the user and call the original methodDi2015NewLine        dynamic modifiedInput = inputs;Di2015NewLine        modifiedInput[0].User = authResult.User;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var invoked = _originalInvoker.Invoke(instance, modifiedInput, out outputs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return invoked;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IAsyncResult InvokeBegin(object instance, object[] inputs, AsyncCallback callback, object state) {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException("The operation cannot be invoked asynchronously.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object InvokeEnd(object instance, out object[] outputs, IAsyncResult result) {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException("The operation cannot be invoked asynchronously.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsSynchronous {Di2015NewLine        get { return true; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13138528Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] hexStrings = { "80", "E293", "F9A2FF", "FFFFFFFF", Di2015NewLine                                "080", "0E293", "0F9A2FF", "0FFFFFFFF",  Di2015NewLine                                "0080", "00E293", "00F9A2FF", "00FFFFFFFF" };Di2015NewLine        foreach (string hexString in hexStrings)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BigInteger number = BigInteger.Parse(Di2015NewLine                hexString,Di2015NewLine                NumberStyles.AllowHexSpecifier);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Converted 0x{0} to {1}.", hexString, number);Di2015NewLine        }         Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// The example displays the following output: Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x80 to -128. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0xE293 to -7533. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0xF9A2FF to -417025. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0xFFFFFFFF to -1. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x080 to 128. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x0E293 to 58003. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x0F9A2FF to 16360191. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x0FFFFFFFF to 4294967295. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x0080 to 128. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x00E293 to 58003. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x00F9A2FF to 16360191. Di2015NewLine//       Converted 0x00FFFFFFFF to 4294967295.Di2015NewLine

13141922Di2015UniqueSeparatorThrottledStream.cs
13141922Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ActionResult GetFile(int id) {Di2015NewLine    var f = FileAcc.GetInfo(id);Di2015NewLine        int bufferSize = 1024, bps = 1024;Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream sourceStream = new FileStream(Server.MapPath(f.file_url), FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read, bufferSize)) {Di2015NewLine            using (Born2Code.Net.ThrottledStream destinationStream = new Born2Code.Net.ThrottledStream(Response.OutputStream, bps)) {Di2015NewLine                byte[] buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine                int readCount = sourceStream.Read(buffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine                Response.Buffer = false;Di2015NewLine                while (readCount > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    destinationStream.Write(buffer, 0, readCount);Di2015NewLine                    readCount = sourceStream.Read(buffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    return new EmptyResult();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13147910Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Image Decode(string binary)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string input = binary;Di2015NewLine    int numOfBytes = input.Length / 8;Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = new byte[numOfBytes];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numOfBytes; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bytes[i] = Convert.ToByte(input.Substring(8 * i, 8), 2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream FromBinary = new MemoryStream(bytes);Di2015NewLine    return Image.FromStream(FromBinary);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13147966Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AsyncCommandHandlerDecorator<TCommand> Di2015NewLine    : ICommandHandler<TCommand> where TCommand : ICommand Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Container _container;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<ICommandHandler<TCommand>> _factory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public AsyncCommandHandlerDecorator(Container container,Di2015NewLine        Func<ICommandHandler<TCommand>> factory) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _container = container;Di2015NewLine        _factory = factory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Handle(TCommand command) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(_ => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (_container.BeginLifetimeScope())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create new handler in this threadDi2015NewLine                // and inside the lifetime scope.Di2015NewLine                var handler = _factory();Di2015NewLine                handler.Handle(command);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

source, Func<TSource, TFirstKey> firstKeySelector, Func<TSource, TSecondKey> secondKeySelector, Func<IEnumerable<TSource>, TValue> aggregate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var retVal = new Dictionary<TFirstKey, Dictionary<TSecondKey, TValue>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var l = source.ToLookup(firstKeySelector);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in l)Di2015NewLine item.ToLookup(secondKeySelector);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var subitem in subdict)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dict.Add(subitem.Key, aggregate(subitem));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retVal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13150790Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RunBatch(CmdObj obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var process = new Process();Di2015NewLine    var startInfo = new ProcessStartInfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileName = obj.SrcFile,Di2015NewLine        WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Normal,Di2015NewLine        CreateNoWindow = false,Di2015NewLine        RedirectStandardInput = true,Di2015NewLine        RedirectStandardOutput = true, //This is required if we want to get the outputDi2015NewLine        RedirectStandardError = true,Di2015NewLine        UseShellExecute = falseDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!obj.SrcFile.ToLower().Trim().EndsWith(".bat"))Di2015NewLine        throw new FileLoadException("Not a valid .bat file",obj.SrcFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        process.StartInfo = startInfo;Di2015NewLine        process.Start();Di2015NewLine        process.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        obj.Activity = process.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd(); //Get the output from the target processDi2015NewLine        obj.Error = process.StandardError.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        obj.Exception = ex;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        process.Close(); //Terminate the process after getting what is requiredDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13152174Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap GenerateScreenshot(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This method gets a screenshot of the webpageDi2015NewLine    // rendered at its full size (height and width)Di2015NewLine    return GenerateScreenshot(url, -1, -1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Bitmap GenerateScreenshot(string url, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Load the webpage into a WebBrowser controlDi2015NewLine    WebBrowser wb = new WebBrowser();Di2015NewLine    wb.ScrollBarsEnabled = false;Di2015NewLine    wb.ScriptErrorsSuppressed = true;Di2015NewLine    wb.Navigate(url);Di2015NewLine    while (wb.ReadyState != WebBrowserReadyState.Complete) { Application.DoEvents(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set the size of the WebBrowser controlDi2015NewLine    wb.Width = width;Di2015NewLine    wb.Height = height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (width == -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Take Screenshot of the web pages full widthDi2015NewLine        wb.Width = wb.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Width;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (height == -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Take Screenshot of the web pages full heightDi2015NewLine        wb.Height = wb.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Height;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get a Bitmap representation of the webpage as it's rendered in the WebBrowser controlDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(wb.Width, wb.Height);Di2015NewLine    wb.DrawToBitmap(bitmap, new Rectangle(0, 0, wb.Width, wb.Height));Di2015NewLine    wb.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return bitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13152637Di2015UniqueSeparator    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, Size = 64)]Di2015NewLine    unsafe struct RowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int this[int index]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // need validation of index or AVDi2015NewLine                fixed (Row* p = &this)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int* value = (int*)p;Di2015NewLine                    return *(value + index);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // need validation of index or AVDi2015NewLine                fixed (Row* p = &this)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int* item = (int*)p;Di2015NewLine                    item += index;Di2015NewLine                    *item = value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13153416Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestMethod]Di2015NewLinepublic void TestLinq2Xml()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  const string text = @"<Metadata xmlns:xsd=""http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"" xmlns:xsi=""http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"">Di2015NewLine                            <Meta xsi:type=""Readonly"" />Di2015NewLine                            <Meta xsi:type=""Garbage"" />Di2015NewLine                      </Metadata>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Get the "names" of all implementors of MetadataBaseDi2015NewLine  var types = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies().ToList()Di2015NewLine     .SelectMany(s => s.GetTypes())Di2015NewLine         .Where(p => typeof(MetadataBase).IsAssignableFrom(p) && !p.IsAbstract && !p.IsInterface)Di2015NewLine         .Where(t => t.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(XmlTypeAttribute), false).Any())Di2015NewLine         .Select(t => t.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(XmlTypeAttribute), false)Di2015NewLine             .Cast<XmlTypeAttribute>().First().TypeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Create a parserDi2015NewLine  var parser = new XmlSerializer(typeof(MetadataBase));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Create metadatacontainer to fillDi2015NewLine  var metas = new MetadataContainer();Di2015NewLine  // Fill it with matching from from the XMLDi2015NewLine  metas.AddRange((from t in XDocument.Parse(text).Descendants("Meta")Di2015NewLine                where types.Contains(t.Attribute(XName.Get("type", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance")).Value)Di2015NewLine                select (MetadataBase)parser.Deserialize(t.CreateReader())).ToList());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Should be one guy presentDi2015NewLine  Assert.AreEqual(metas.Count, 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
