13156748Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable.Merge
13156748Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable MergeAll(this IList<DataTable> tables, String primaryKeyColumn)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!tables.Any())Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Tables must not be empty", "tables");Di2015NewLine    if(primaryKeyColumn != null)Di2015NewLine        foreach(DataTable t in tables)Di2015NewLine            if(!t.Columns.Contains(primaryKeyColumn))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("All tables must have the specified primarykey column " + primaryKeyColumn, "primaryKeyColumn");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(tables.Count == 1)Di2015NewLine        return tables[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable("TblUnion");Di2015NewLine    table.BeginLoadData(); // Turns off notifications, index maintenance, and constraints while loading dataDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataTable t in tables)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        table.Merge(t); // same as table.Merge(t, false, MissingSchemaAction.Add);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    table.EndLoadData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (primaryKeyColumn != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // since we might have no real primary keys defined, the rows now might have repeating fieldsDi2015NewLine        // so now we're going to "join" these rows ...Di2015NewLine        var pkGroups = table.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine            .GroupBy(r => r[primaryKeyColumn]);Di2015NewLine        var dupGroups = pkGroups.Where(g => g.Count() > 1);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var grpDup in dupGroups)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            // use first row and modify itDi2015NewLine            DataRow firstRow = grpDup.First();Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataColumn c in table.Columns)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (firstRow.IsNull(c))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DataRow firstNotNullRow = grpDup.Skip(1).FirstOrDefault(r => !r.IsNull(c));Di2015NewLine                    if (firstNotNullRow != null)Di2015NewLine                        firstRow[c] = firstNotNullRow[c];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // remove all but first rowDi2015NewLine            var rowsToRemove = grpDup.Skip(1);Di2015NewLine            foreach(DataRow rowToRemove in rowsToRemove)Di2015NewLine                table.Rows.Remove(rowToRemove);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13156748Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar tables = new[] { Table1, Table2 };Di2015NewLinetables.MergeAll("Name");Di2015NewLine
13156748Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar Table1 = new DataTable();Di2015NewLinevar Table2 = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineTable1.Columns.Add("Name");Di2015NewLineTable1.Columns.Add("LastName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTable2.Columns.Add("Name");Di2015NewLineTable2.Columns.Add("Comment");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTable1.Rows.Add("Niki", "Row");Di2015NewLineTable1.Rows.Add("Hube", "Slang");Di2015NewLineTable1.Rows.Add("Koke", "Mi");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTable2.Rows.Add("Koke", "Hello");Di2015NewLineTable2.Rows.Add("Niki", "Hi");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar tables = new DataTable[] { Table1, Table2 };Di2015NewLineDataTable merged = tables.MergeAll("Name");Di2015NewLine

13157368Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StrongFileTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _friendlyName = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StrongFileType(string friendlyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _friendlyName = friendlyName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<StrongFileType> CompatibleTypes { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _friendlyName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void SampleTest()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The possible typesDi2015NewLine    var typeA = new StrongFileType("A");Di2015NewLine    var typeB = new StrongFileType("B");Di2015NewLine    var typeC = new StrongFileType("C");Di2015NewLine    var typeD = new StrongFileType("D");Di2015NewLine    var typeE = new StrongFileType("E");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Setup possible compatible typesDi2015NewLine    typeA.CompatibleTypes = new List<StrongFileType> { typeA, typeB, typeC, typeD };Di2015NewLine    typeB.CompatibleTypes = new List<StrongFileType> { typeA, typeB, typeC };Di2015NewLine    typeC.CompatibleTypes = new List<StrongFileType> { typeA, typeB, typeC, typeD };Di2015NewLine    typeD.CompatibleTypes = new List<StrongFileType> { typeA, typeC, typeD, typeE };Di2015NewLine    typeE.CompatibleTypes = new List<StrongFileType> { typeD, typeE };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now do a check...Di2015NewLine    var userSubmittedFilesValid = new List<StrongFileType> { typeA, typeB, typeC };Di2015NewLine    CheckCompatible(userSubmittedFilesValid);Di2015NewLine    var userSubmittedFilesInvalid = new List<StrongFileType> { typeA, typeB, typeC, typeD };Di2015NewLine    CheckCompatible(userSubmittedFilesInvalid);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool CheckCompatible(IEnumerable<StrongFileType> requestedFiles)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Useful for debuggingDi2015NewLine    var validList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    var invalidList = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (StrongFileType fileType in requestedFiles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string invalid = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        string validCombination = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (StrongFileType fileTypeToCheck in requestedFiles)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!fileType.CompatibleTypes.Contains(fileTypeToCheck))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Show as not compatible and remove any previously valid combinations that matchDi2015NewLine                invalid += string.Format("{0} not compatible with {1}", fileType, fileTypeToCheck);Di2015NewLine                validList.RemoveAll(x => x.Contains(fileType.ToString()) && x.Contains(fileTypeToCheck.ToString()));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                validCombination += string.Format("{0}", fileTypeToCheck);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add to respective listsDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(validCombination) && !validList.Contains(validCombination))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            validList.Add(validCombination);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(invalid))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            invalidList.Add(invalid);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Was valid?Di2015NewLine    return invalidList.Count == 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13157694Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Export( int fileSize )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SqlDataReader reader = // command to return the recordset to export...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int bytesLeft = fileSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // open first output fileDi2015NewLine    while ( reader.Read() )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // write the rowDi2015NewLine        bytesLeft -= // length of the row you just wroteDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( bytesLeft <= 0 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // close this fileDi2015NewLine            // open the next fileDi2015NewLine            bytesLeft = fileSize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // close the last file.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13160328Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Fakes the HTTP context.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="url">The URL.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="ip">The ip.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="referrer">The referrer.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A HTTP context.</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static HttpContextBase FakeHttpContext(string url, string ip, string referrer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Uri uri = new Uri(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var context = new Mock<HttpContextBase>();Di2015NewLine    var files = new Mock<HttpFileCollectionBase>();Di2015NewLine    var request = new Mock<HttpRequestBase>();Di2015NewLine    var response = new Mock<HttpResponseBase>();Di2015NewLine    var session = new Mock<HttpSessionStateBase>();Di2015NewLine    var server = new Mock<HttpServerUtilityBase>();Di2015NewLine    var user = new Mock<IPrincipal>();Di2015NewLine    var identity = new Mock<IIdentity>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.ApplicationPath).Returns("~/");Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionFilePath).Returns("~/");Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.PathInfo).Returns(string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.Form).Returns(new NameValueCollection());Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.QueryString).Returns(HttpUtility.ParseQueryString(uri.Query));Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.Files).Returns(files.Object);Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.UserHostAddress).Returns(ip);Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.UrlReferrer).Returns(new Uri(referrer));Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.Url).Returns(uri);Di2015NewLine    request.Setup(req => req.RawUrl).Returns(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    response.Setup(res => res.ApplyAppPathModifier(It.IsAny<string>())).Returns((string virtualPath) => virtualPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    user.Setup(usr => usr.Identity).Returns(identity.Object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    identity.SetupGet(ident => ident.IsAuthenticated).Returns(true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.Setup(ctx => ctx.Request).Returns(request.Object);Di2015NewLine    context.Setup(ctx => ctx.Response).Returns(response.Object);Di2015NewLine    context.Setup(ctx => ctx.Session).Returns(session.Object);Di2015NewLine    context.Setup(ctx => ctx.Server).Returns(server.Object);Di2015NewLine    context.Setup(ctx => ctx.User).Returns(user.Object);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return context.Object;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13167225Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool __declspec(naked) IsCPU64BitCapable()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    __asmDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Save EBX since it's affected by CPUIDDi2015NewLine        push ebxDi2015NewLine        // Determine whether the CPU supports retrieving extended feature dataDi2015NewLine        mov eax, 0x80000000Di2015NewLine        cpuidDi2015NewLine        cmp eax, 0x80000000Di2015NewLine        // No extended data => no 64 bitDi2015NewLine        jbe no_extended_dataDi2015NewLine        // Request extended feature dataDi2015NewLine        mov eax, 0x80000001Di2015NewLine        cpuidDi2015NewLine        // Bit 29 of EDX will now indicate whether the CPU is 64 bit capableDi2015NewLine        mov eax, edxDi2015NewLine        shr eax, 29Di2015NewLine        and eax, 1Di2015NewLine        jmp extended_dataDi2015NewLine    no_extended_data:Di2015NewLine        xor eax,eaxDi2015NewLine    extended_data:Di2015NewLine        // Restore EBXDi2015NewLine        pop ebxDi2015NewLine        retDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13167225Di2015UniqueSeparator[DllImport("Test64Bit.dll")]Di2015NewLineprivate static extern bool IsCPU64BitCapable();Di2015NewLine

13168930Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string JsonPost(string url, string method, string postData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Uri address = new Uri(url + method);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get User current network credentialDi2015NewLine    ICredentials credentials = CredentialCache.DefaultCredentials;Di2015NewLine    NetworkCredential credential = credentials.GetCredential(address, "Basic");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(address) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine    request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "application/json";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Network Credential should be included on the request to avoid network issues when requesting to the web serviceDi2015NewLine    request.Proxy = WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy;Di2015NewLine    request.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(credential.UserName, credential.Password, credential.Domain);Di2015NewLine    request.Proxy.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(credential.UserName, credential.Password, credential.Domain);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] byteData = UTF8Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLine    request.ContentLength = byteData.Length;Di2015NewLine    using (Stream postStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        postStream.Write(byteData, 0, byteData.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (HttpWebResponse response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string JsonResponse = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return JsonResponse;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13176316Di2015UniqueSeparator[SecurityPermission(SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand, Flags=SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure)]Di2015NewLinepublic override string ToString()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (this.m_Syntax == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.m_iriParsing && this.InFact(Flags.HasUnicode))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.m_String;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this.OriginalString;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    this.EnsureUriInfo();Di2015NewLine    if (this.m_Info.String == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.Syntax.IsSimple)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_Info.String = this.GetComponentsHelper(UriComponents.AbsoluteUri, (UriFormat) 0x7fff);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.m_Info.String = this.GetParts(UriComponents.AbsoluteUri, UriFormat.SafeUnescaped);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return this.m_Info.String;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13176834Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomRichTextBox : RichTextBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private bool isDragging = false;Di2015NewLine    private Point draggingPoint;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool isDragAllowed = false;Di2015NewLine        Point pt = e.GetPosition(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (pt.Y >= 0 && pt.Y <= this.BorderThickness.Top)Di2015NewLine            // Allow dragging if the mouse is down on the top borderDi2015NewLine            isDragAllowed = true;Di2015NewLine        else if (pt.Y >= (this.RenderSize.Height - this.BorderThickness.Right) && pt.X <= this.RenderSize.Width)Di2015NewLine            // Allow dragging if the mouse is down on the right borderDi2015NewLine            isDragAllowed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!isDragAllowed)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        draggingPoint = pt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.CaptureMouse();Di2015NewLine        isDragging = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnPreviewMouseMove(MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPreviewMouseMove(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isDragging)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CustomRichTextBox elem = this;Di2015NewLine            TransformGroup ct = new TransformGroup();Di2015NewLine            UIElement parent = (UIElement)elem.Parent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TranslateTransform tr = new TranslateTransform(Di2015NewLine                e.GetPosition(parent).X - }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static CanExecuteObservable WhenAny(this IReactiveNotifyPropertyChanged obj, Expression<Func<object>> property1, Func<bool> func)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //etc...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CanExecuteObservable : IObservable<bool>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal func;Di2015NewLine        AddProperties(expressions);Di2015NewLine        objDi2015NewLine            .ChangedDi2015NewLine            .Where(oc => propertyNames.Any(propertyName => propertyName == oc.PropertyName))Di2015NewLine            .Subscribe(oc => Fire());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly List<string> propertyNames = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<bool> func;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddProperties(IEnumerable<Expression<Func<object>>> expressions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var expression in expressions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string propertyName = ReflectionHelper.GetPropertyNameFromExpression(expression);Di2015NewLine            propertyNames.Add(propertyName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddProperties(Expression<Func<object>> property1) { AddProperties(new[] { property1 }); }Di2015NewLine    public void AddProperties(Expression<Func<object>> property1, Expression<Func<object>> property2) { AddProperties(new[] { property1, property2 }); }Di2015NewLine    //etc...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        propertyNames.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Subject<bool> subject = new Subject<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Fire()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        subject.OnNext(func());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IDisposable Subscribe(IObserver<bool> observer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return subject.Subscribe(observer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13178227Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ReflectionHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string GetPropertyNameFromExpression<T>(Expression<Func<T>> property) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var lambda = (LambdaExpression)property;Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression memberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (lambda.Body is UnaryExpression) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var unaryExpression = (UnaryExpression)lambda.Body;Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = (MemberExpression)unaryExpression.Operand;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            memberExpression = (MemberExpression)lambda.Body;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return memberExpression.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13178821Di2015UniqueSeparator//open tif fileDi2015NewLinevar tif = Tiff.Open(@"file", "r");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//get number of pagesDi2015NewLinevar num = tif.NumberOfDirectories();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (short i = 0; i < num; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //set current pageDi2015NewLine    tif.SetDirectory(i); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap bmp = GetBitmapFormTiff(tif);Di2015NewLine    bmp.Save(string.Format(@"newfile{0}.bmp", i));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13178821Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Bitmap GetBitmapFormTiff(Tiff tif)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldValue[] value = tif.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH);Di2015NewLine            int width = value[0].ToInt();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            value = tif.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH);Di2015NewLine            int height = value[0].ToInt();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Read the image into the memory bufferDi2015NewLine            var raster = new int[height * width];Di2015NewLine            if (!tif.ReadRGBAImage(width, height, raster))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bmp = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BitmapData bmpdata = bmp.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb);Di2015NewLine            var bits = new byte[bmpdata.Stride * bmpdata.Height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < bmp.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int rasterOffset = y * bmp.Width;Di2015NewLine                int bitsOffset = (bmp.Height - y - 1) * bmpdata.Stride;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int x = 0; x < bmp.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int rgba = raster[rasterOffset++];Di2015NewLine                    bits[bitsOffset++] = (byte)((rgba >> 16) & 0xff);Di2015NewLine                    bits[bitsOffset++] = (byte)((rgba >> 8) & 0xff);Di2015NewLine                    bits[bitsOffset++] = (byte)(rgba & 0xff);Di2015NewLine                    bits[bitsOffset++] = (byte)((rgba >> 24) & 0xff);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(bits, 0, bmpdata.Scan0, bits.Length);Di2015NewLine            bmp.UnlockBits(bmpdata);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return bmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13179779Di2015UniqueSeparatorItem
13179779Di2015UniqueSeparatorName
13179779Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble levWeight = 1.0;   // adjust these weights as you see fitDi2015NewLinedouble matchWeight = 1.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// add whatever to here you'd likeDi2015NewLinevar splitOn = new[] { ' ', '!', '"', '#', '$', '%', '&', '\\'', '(', ')', '-' };Di2015NewLineFunc<string, string[]> split = Di2015NewLine    s => s.Split(splitOn, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar matches =Di2015NewLine    from xx in mineDi2015NewLine    let xp = split(xx.Name)Di2015NewLine    select new {Di2015NewLine        Item = xx,Di2015NewLine        Matches =Di2015NewLine           (from yy in theirsDi2015NewLine            let yp = split(yy.Name)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* found how many name components match */Di2015NewLine            let mm = xp.Intersect(yp, StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase).Count()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* find the Levenshtein distance of the two names */Di2015NewLine            let ld = LevDist(xx, yy)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* weight our two criteria */Di2015NewLine            let ww = (matchWeight * mm) + (levWeight / ld)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* should match on at least ONE name component */Di2015NewLine            where mm > 0Di2015NewLine            orderby ww descendingDi2015NewLine            select yy)Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine

13180538Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Expression<Func<Foo, bool>> SearchMatch(Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Foo, string>> property, string searchTerm)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var foo = Expression.Parameter(typeof(Foo), "foo");Di2015NewLine    // Get the property info from the property expression.Di2015NewLine    var prop = Expression.Property(foo, Di2015NewLine        (property.Body as MemberExpression).Member as PropertyInfo);Di2015NewLine    var search = Expression.Constant(searchTerm);Di2015NewLine    var equal = Expression.Equal(prop, search);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<Foo, bool>>(equal, foo);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13180967Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void SaveToMDB(DataSet ds, string strMDBFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    OleDbConnection cAccess = new OleDbConnection(Di2015NewLine        "Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data source=" + strMDBFile);Di2015NewLine    cAccess.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (DataTable oTable in ds.Tables)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OleDbCommand oCommand = new OleDbCommand(Di2015NewLine            "DROP TABLE [" + oTable.TableName + "]", cAccess);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string strCreateColumns = "";Di2015NewLine        string strColumnList = "";Di2015NewLine        string strQuestionList = "";Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn oColumn in oTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            strCreateColumns += "[" + oColumn.ColumnName + "] VarChar(255), ";Di2015NewLine            strColumnList += "[" + oColumn.ColumnName + "],";Di2015NewLine            strQuestionList += "?,";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        strCreateColumns = strCreateColumns.Remove(strCreateColumns.Length - 13184473Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void DrawBrokenLine(PointF[] line, string text, Graphics g, Font font)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < line.Length - 1; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float distance = distanceBetween(line[index], line[index + 1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (text.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int cIndex = text.Length; cIndex >= 0; cIndex--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SizeF textSize = g.MeasureString(text.Substring(0, cIndex).Trim(), font);Di2015NewLine                    if (textSize.Width <= distance)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        float rotation = angleBetween(line[index], line[index + 1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        g.TranslateTransform(line[index].X, line[index].Y);Di2015NewLine                        g.RotateTransform(rotation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        g.DrawString(text.Substring(0, cIndex).Trim(), font, new SolidBrush(Color.Black),Di2015NewLine                            new PointF(0, -textSize.Height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        g.RotateTransform(-rotation);Di2015NewLine                        g.TranslateTransform(-line[index].X, -line[index].Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        text = text.Remove(0, cIndex);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
13184473Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void DrawBrokenLine(PointF[] line, string text, Graphics g, Font font)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float lastOverlap = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < line.Length - 1; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float distance = distanceBetween(line[index], line[index + 1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            float angleOfLines = 180;Di2015NewLine            if (index < line.Length - 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                angleOfLines = angleBetweenLines(line[index], line[index + 1], line[index + 2]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (text.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SizeF textSize = g.MeasureString(text, font);Di2015NewLine                float overlap = 0;Di2015NewLine                if (angleOfLines < 180)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (angleOfLines <= 90)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        overlap = (textSize.Height / 1.5f) / (Di2015NewLine                            Convert.ToSingle(Math.Tan((angleOfLines / 2) * Math.PI / 180))Di2015NewLine                            );Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        overlap = Convert.ToSingle(Di2015NewLine                            Math.Sin(angleOfLines * Math.PI / 180) * (textSize.Height / 1.5f));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int cIndex = text.Length; cIndex >= 0; cIndex--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    textSize = g.MeasureString(text.Substring(0, cIndex).Trim(), font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (textSize.Width <= distance - overlap - lastOverlap)   //notice the subtraction of overlapDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        float rotation = angleBetween(line[index], line[index + 1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        g.TranslateTransform(line[index].X, line[index].Y);Di2015NewLine                        g.RotateTransform(rotation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        g.DrawString(text.Substring(0, cIndex).Trim(), font, new SolidBrush(Color.Black),Di2015NewLine                            new PointF(lastOverlap, -textSize.Height));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        g.RotateTransform(-rotation);Di2015NewLine                        g.TranslateTransform(-line[index].X, -line[index].Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        text = text.Remove(0, cIndex);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                lastOverlap = overlap;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static float angleBetweenLines(PointF A, PointF B, PointF C)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float angle1 = 360 - angleBetween(A, B);Di2015NewLine        float angle2 = 360 - angleBetween(B, C);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (angle1 < 0)Di2015NewLine            angle1 += 360;Di2015NewLine        if (angle2 < 0)Di2015NewLine            angle2 += 360;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float delta = 180 + angle1 - angle2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (delta < 0)Di2015NewLine            delta += 360;Di2015NewLine        if (delta > 360)Di2015NewLine            delta -= 360;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return delta;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13184978Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Border_MouseDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var mainborder = sender as Border;Di2015NewLine        double x = e.GetPosition(mainborder).X;Di2015NewLine        double val = 1 - (mainborder.ActualWidth - x) / mainborder.ActualWidth;Di2015NewLine        slider.Value = val * (slider.Maximum - slider.Minimum) + slider.Minimum;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SliderValueConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double val = (double)values[0];Di2015NewLine        double min = (double)values[1];Di2015NewLine        double max = (double)values[2];Di2015NewLine        double sliderWidth = (double)values[3];Di2015NewLine        return sliderWidth * (val - min) / (max - min);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine 13185041Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ImagingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool AnnotateImage(string sFilePath, string sText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get an ImageCodecInfo object that represents the TIFF codec.Di2015NewLine            ImageCodecInfo myImageCodecInfo = GetEncoderInfo("image/tiff");Di2015NewLine            Encoder myEncoder = Encoder.Compression;Di2015NewLine            EncoderParameters myEncoderParameters = new EncoderParameters(1);Di2015NewLine            EncoderParameter myEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, (long)EncoderValue.CompressionCCITT4);Di2015NewLine            myEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create some global variablesDi2015NewLine            Point pointPosition = new Point(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            PointF pPos = new PointF((float)pointPosition.X, (float)pointPosition.Y);Di2015NewLine            Bitmap newBmp;Di2015NewLine            Graphics g;Di2015NewLine            Font fNewFont;Di2015NewLine            SizeF sizeTextSize;Di2015NewLine            Rectangle rectTextSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Set inital width and height variablesDi2015NewLine            int iW;Di2015NewLine            int iH;Di2015NewLine            int iAnnotationH = 44;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using(Image iSource = Image.FromFile(sFilePath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                iW = iSource.Width;Di2015NewLine                iH = iSource.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Increase the height of the imageDi2015NewLine                iH += iAnnotationH;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Create the new bitmap objectDi2015NewLine                newBmp = new Bitmap(iW, iH);Di2015NewLine                newBmp.SetResolution(200.0F, 200.0F);Di2015NewLine                g = Graphics.FromImage(newBmp);Di2015NewLine                g.Clear(Color.White);Di2015NewLine                g.DrawImageUnscaled(iSource, 0, iAnnotationH, iW, iH);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Create the font object to draw the annotation textDi2015NewLine                fNewFont = new Font("Verdana", 12);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Get the size of the area to be drawn then convert it to a rectDi2015NewLine                sizeTextSize = g.MeasureString(sText, fNewFont);Di2015NewLine                rectTextSize = new Rectangle(pointPosition.X, pointPosition.Y, (int)sizeTextSize.Width, (int)sizeTextSize.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Draw a white rectDi2015NewLine                g.FillRectangle(Brushes.White, rectTextSize);Di2015NewLine                g.TextRenderingHint = System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine                g.DrawString(sText, fNewFont, Brushes.Black, pPos);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Save the changed imageDi2015NewLine            newBmp.Save(sFilePath, myImageCodecInfo, myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static ImageCodecInfo GetEncoderInfo(String mimeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int j;Di2015NewLine        ImageCodecInfo[] encoders;Di2015NewLine        encoders =     return encoders[j];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13186049Di2015UniqueSeparator        int n; //dimension of the matrixDi2015NewLine        Button [,] btns;Di2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine            n = 2;/*You should set here the dimension of your matix. I considered it nxn because of diagonals. If you want nxm matrix than the code is a little bit complicated but not too much*/Di2015NewLine            btns = new Button[n, n];Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 0;i<n;i++)Di2015NewLine               for(int j = 0; j<n; j++)Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                   Button btn = new Button();Di2015NewLine                   btn.Location = new Point(i*20,j*40);Di2015NewLine                   btn.Size = new Size(18,38);Di2015NewLine                   btns[i,j] = btn;Di2015NewLine                   this.Controls.Add(btn);Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int mainDiag = 0;Di2015NewLine            int secDiag = 0;Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            int j = 0;Di2015NewLine            int [] cols = new int[n];Di2015NewLine            int winner = 0; //no winnerDi2015NewLine            while(winner == 0 && i<n)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int row = 0;Di2015NewLine                j = 0;Di2015NewLine                while(j<n)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (btns[i, j].BackColor == Color.Blue)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (i == j)Di2015NewLine                            mainDiag++;//inrement main diagonalDi2015NewLine                        if(i + j == n-1)Di2015NewLine                            secDiag++;//increment second diagonalDi2015NewLine                        row++; //increment rowDi2015NewLine                        cols[i]++; //increment columnDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (btns[i, j].BackColor == Color.Red)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (i == j)Di2015NewLine                            mainDiag--;Di2015NewLine                        if(i + j == n-1)Di2015NewLine                            secDiag--;Di2015NewLine                        row--;Di2015NewLine                        cols[i]++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    j++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if(row == n) //if row value == n whole row is blue and blue player winsDi2015NewLine                    winner = 1;Di2015NewLine                else if(row == -n)Di2015NewLine                    winner = -1; //if row value == -n whole row is red and red player winsDi2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if(winner == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(mainDiag == n)Di2015NewLine                    winner = 1; //similar for the diagonalDi2015NewLine                else if(mainDiag == -n)Di2015NewLine                    winner = -1; Di2015NewLine                else if(secDiag == n)Di2015NewLine                    winner = 1;//similar for the second diagonalDi2015NewLine                else if(secDiag == -n)Di2015NewLine                    winner = -1;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    i = 0;Di2015NewLine                    while (winner == 0 && i < n)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (cols[i] == n)Di2015NewLine                            winner = 1; //i-th column is whole blue and blue player winsDi2015NewLine                        else if (cols[i] == -n)Di2015NewLine                            winner = -1; //i-th column is whole red and red player winsDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (winner == 1)Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Blue wins");Di2015NewLine            else if(winner == -1)Di2015NewLine                MessageBox.Show("Red wins");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

13197708Di2015UniqueSeparator    private Attachment createCardAttachment()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // new variable for sizeDi2015NewLine        long attSize = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //  Information stringDi2015NewLine        string FamilyName = "FamilyName";Di2015NewLine        string FirstName = "FirstName";Di2015NewLine        string MiddleName = "MiddleName";Di2015NewLine        string Title = "Miss,Mr.";Di2015NewLine        string Suffix = "suffix(s)";Di2015NewLine        //  string Birthday = "YYYY-MM-DD";Di2015NewLine        string WorkAddressStreet = "WorkAddressStreet";Di2015NewLine        string WorkAddressCity = "WorkAddressCity";Di2015NewLine        string WorkAddressStateProvince = "WorkAddressStateProvince";Di2015NewLine        string WorkAddressZipPostalCode = "1234 AA";Di2015NewLine        string WorkAddressCountry = "WorkAddressCountry";Di2015NewLine        string HomeAddressStreet = "HomeAddressStreet";Di2015NewLine        string HomeAddressCity = "HomeAddressCity";Di2015NewLine        string HomeAddressStateProvince = "HomeAddressStateProvince";Di2015NewLine        string HomeAddressZipPostalCode = "1234 AA";Di2015NewLine        string HomeAddressCountry = "HomeAddressCountry";Di2015NewLine        string EmailPersonal = "Person@personaldomain.com";Di2015NewLine        string EmailWork = "Person@workdomain.com";Di2015NewLine        string Organization = "Organization";Di2015NewLine        string WorkPhone = "123-456-7890 ext 321";Di2015NewLine        string WorkFax = "123-456-7890";Di2015NewLine        string CellPhone = "123-456-7890";Di2015NewLine        string HomePhone = "123-456-7890";Di2015NewLine        string JobTitle = "Programmer";Di2015NewLine        string WorkURL = "http://www.domain.com";Di2015NewLine        string ID = Request.QueryString["ID"]; // Database QueryStringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //  Save vCard Generate Code as .vcf extensionDi2015NewLine        string path = ("C:\\\\local\\\\vCardGenerator.Website\\\\FirstName_LastName.vcf");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Test attachment sendDi2015NewLine        Attachment attach = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream actualAttachment = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //  vCard C# CodeDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(ms))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("BEGIN:VCARD\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("VERSION:1.0\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("N;LANGUAGE=en-us:{0};{1};{2};{3};{4};;\\r\\n", FamilyName, FirstName, MiddleName, Title, Suffix);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("FN:{0} {1} {2} {3} {4}\\r\\n", Title, FirstName, MiddleName, Suffix, FamilyName);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("ORG:{0}\\r\\n", Organization, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("TEL;WORK;VOICE:{0}\\r\\n", WorkPhone, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("TEL;WORK;FAX:{0}\\r\\n", WorkFax, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("TEL;CELL;VOICE:{0}\\r\\n", CellPhone, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("TEL;HOME;VOICE:{0}\\r\\n", HomePhone, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("TITLE:{0}\\r\\n", JobTitle, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("ADR;INTL;PARCEL;WORK:;;{0}; {1}; {2}; {3}; {4};\\r\\n", WorkAddressStreet, WorkAddressCity, WorkAddressStateProvince, WorkAddressZipPostalCode, WorkAddressCountry);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("ADR;INTL;PARCEL;HOME:;;{0}; {1}; {2}; {3}; {4};\\r\\n", HomeAddressStreet, HomeAddressCity, HomeAddressStateProvince, HomeAddressZipPostalCode, HomeAddressCountry);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("URL;WORK:{0}\\r\\n", WorkURL);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("EMAIL;PREF;INTERNET:{0}\\r\\n", EmailPersonal);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("EMAIL;INTERNET:{0}\\r\\n", EmailWork);Di2015NewLine            sw.Write("END:VCARD\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ContentType ct = new ContentType(MediaTypeNames.Application.Octet);Di2015NewLine            sw.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            attSize = ms.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Added position set to makesure copy works right...Di2015NewLine            ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Copy to the stream you plan to useDi2015NewLine            ms.CopyTo(actualAttachment);Di2015NewLine            actualAttachment.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        attach = new Attachment(actualAttachment, ct);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Try to set the attachment size nowDi2015NewLine        attach.ContentDisposition.Size = attSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        attach.ContentDisposition.FileName = "FirstName_LastName.vcf";Di2015NewLine        attach.Name = "FirstName_LastName.vcf";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return attach;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13198990Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace Microsoft.Xna.FrameworkDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine#if WINDOWSDi2015NewLine    public class Point3Converter: System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanConvertFrom( System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type sourceType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return sourceType == typeof( string );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override object ConvertFrom( System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] tokens = (( string ) value).Split( ';' );Di2015NewLine                return new Point3( int.Parse( tokens[0] ), int.Parse( tokens[1] ), int.Parse( tokens[2] ) );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return context.PropertyDescriptor.GetValue( context.Instance );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override object ConvertTo( System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point3 p = ( Point3 ) value;Di2015NewLine            return p.X +";"+ p.Y+";" + p.Z;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter( typeof( Point3Converter ) )]Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine    public struct Point3Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int X,Y,Z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static readonly Point3 UnitX = new Point3( 1, 0, 0 );Di2015NewLine        public static readonly Point3 UnitY = new Point3( 0, 1, 0 );Di2015NewLine        public static readonly Point3 UnitZ = new Point3( 0, 0, 1 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Point3( int X, int Y, int Z )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.X =      {Di2015NewLine            return new Vector3( A.X + B.X, A.Y + B.Y, A.Z + B.Z );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static Point3 operator +( Point3 A, Point3 B 13200232Di2015UniqueSeparatorStats on my quad core P7: Di2015NewLineGenerating a 500k digit random number using power and multiply: 5 secondsDi2015NewLineDividing that big number by anything just once: 11 secondsDi2015NewLineToString(): 22 secondsDi2015NewLineToQuickString: 18 secondsDi2015NewLineToStringMT: 12.9 secondsDi2015NewLine
13200232Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class BigIntExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static List<BigInteger> powersOfTen;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Must be called before ToStringMt()Di2015NewLine    public static void InitPowersOfTen(BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        powersOfTen = new List<BigInteger>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        powersOfTen.Add(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (BigInteger i = 10; i < n; i *= i)Di2015NewLine            powersOfTen.Add(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ToStringMT(this BigInteger n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // compute the index into the powersOfTen table for the given parameter. This is very fast.Di2015NewLine        var m = (int)Math.Ceiling(Math.Log(BigInteger.Log10(n), 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BigInteger r1;Di2015NewLine        // the largest amount of execution time happens right here:Di2015NewLine        BigInteger q1 = BigInteger.DivRem(n, BigIntExtensions.powersOfTen[m], out r1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // split the remaining work across 4 threads - 3 new threads plus the current threadDi2015NewLine        var t1 = Task.Factory.StartNew<string>(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BigInteger r1r2;Di2015NewLine            BigInteger r1q2 = BigInteger.DivRem(r1, BigIntExtensions.powersOfTen[m - 1], out r1r2);Di2015NewLine            var t2 = Task.Factory.StartNew<string>(() => BuildString(r1r2, m - 2));Di2015NewLine            return BuildString(r1q2, m - 2) + t2.Result;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        BigInteger q1r2;Di2015NewLine        BigInteger q1q2 = BigInteger.DivRem(q1, BigIntExtensions.powersOfTen[m - 1], out q1r2);Di2015NewLine        var t3 = Task.Factory.StartNew<string>(() => BuildString(q1r2, m - 2));Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(BuildString(q1q2, m - 2));Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(t3.Result);Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(t1.Result);Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // same as ToQuickString, but bails out before m == 0 to reduce call overhead.Di2015NewLine    // BigInteger.ToString() is faster than DivRem for smallish numbers.Di2015NewLine    private static string BuildString(BigInteger n, int m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m <= 8)Di2015NewLine            return n.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BigInteger remainder;Di2015NewLine        BigInteger quotient = BigInteger.DivRem(n, powersOfTen[m], out remainder);Di2015NewLine        return BuildString(quotient, m - 1) + BuildString(remainder, m - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13202945Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static MyAuthorizations GetMyAuthorizations(IEnumerable<MethodInfo> actions)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var myAuthorization = new MyAuthorizations();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var methodInfo in actions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var authorizationAttributes =  methodInfoDi2015NewLine                .GetCustomAttributes(typeof (MyAuthorizationAttribute), false)Di2015NewLine                .Cast<MyAuthorizationAttribute>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var myAuthorizationAttribute in authorizationAttributes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            myAuthorization.Roles.Add(MyAuthorizationAttribute.Role);Di2015NewLine            myAuthorization.Permissions.Add(MyAuthorizationAttribute.Permission);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return myAuthorization;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class MyAuthorizationsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MyAuthorizations()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Roles = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        Permissions = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public List<string> Roles { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public List<string> Permissions { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13202945Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string AuthorizedAction(this UrlHelper url, string controller, string action)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var actions = GetActions(controller, action);Di2015NewLine    var authorized = GetMyAuthorizations(actions);Di2015NewLine    if(user.Roles.Any(userrole => authorized.Roles.Any(role => role == userrole)) ||Di2015NewLine       user.Permissions.Any(userPermission => authorized.Permissions.Any(permission => permission == userPermission)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return url.Action(controller,action)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return string.empty;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13203024Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach(Match match in Regex.Matches(input, @"([a-z]+):((?:(?![a-z]+:).)*)"))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string fieldName = match.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine    string value = match.Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13203024Di2015UniqueSeparator(     # opens a capturing group; the content can later be accessed with Groups[1]Di2015NewLine[a-z] # lower-case letterDi2015NewLine+     # one or more of themDi2015NewLine)     # end of capturing groupDi2015NewLine:     # a literal colonDi2015NewLine(     # opens a capturing group; the content can later be accessed with Groups[2]Di2015NewLine(?:   # opens a non-capturing group; just a necessary subpattern which we do notDi2015NewLine      # need later any moreDi2015NewLine(?!   # negative lookahead; this will NOT match if the pattern inside matchesDi2015NewLine[a-z]+:Di2015NewLine      # a word followed by a colon; just the same as we used at the beginning ofDi2015NewLine      # the regexDi2015NewLine)     # end of negative lookahead (not that this does not consume any characters;Di2015NewLine      # it LOOKS ahead)Di2015NewLine.     # any character (except for line breaks)Di2015NewLine)     # end of non-capturing groupDi2015NewLine*     # 0 or more of thoseDi2015NewLine)     # end of capturing groupDi2015NewLine

13203634Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool ExitRequired(string line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return string.Equals(line, "q", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const double price = 10;Di2015NewLine    int userInputDigit;Di2015NewLine    double userCost;Di2015NewLine    string line = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!ExitRequired(line))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Enter a number or press 'q' to exit...");Di2015NewLine        line = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (ExitRequired(line))Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (int.TryParse(line, out userInputDigit) Di2015NewLine            && userInputDigit > 0 Di2015NewLine            && userInputDigit < 100)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (userInputDigit <= 50)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                userCost = (price * userInputDigit);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("You have purchased {0} Widgets at a cost of {1:c0}", userInputDigit, userCost);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if ((userInputDigit > 50) && (userInputDigit <= 80))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                userCost = (price * 50) + ((userInputDigit - 50) * (price - 1));Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("You have purchased {0} Widgets at a cost of {1:c0}", userInputDigit, userCost);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if ((userInputDigit > 80) && (userInputDigit <= 100))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                userCost = (price * 50) + (30 * (price - 1)) + ((userInputDigit - 80) * (price - 2.50));Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("You have purchased {0} Widgets at a cost of {1:c0}", userInputDigit, userCost);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Error! Please input a number between 0 and 100");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13206276Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte[] u8_Salt = new byte[] { 0x26, 0x19, 0x81, 0x4E, 0xA0, 0x6D, 0x95, 0x34, 0x26, 0x75, 0x64, 0x05, 0xF6 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string EncryptString(string plainText, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Rfc2898DeriveBytes pdb = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes(password, u8_Salt);Di2015NewLine    using (RijndaelManaged i_Alg = new RijndaelManaged { Key = pdb.GetBytes(32), IV = pdb.GetBytes(16) })Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, i_Alg.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] data = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(plainText);Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine            cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Convert.ToBase64String(memoryStream.GetBuffer(), 0, (int)memoryStream.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string Decrypt(string cipherText, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine pdb.GetBytes(32), IV = pdb.GetBytes(16) })Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, i_Alg.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] data = Convert.FromBase64String(cipherText);Di2015NewLine                cryptoStream.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine                cryptoStream.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(memoryStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13212754Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CopyNonNullProperties(object source, object target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // You could potentially relax this, e.g. making sure that theDi2015NewLine    // target was a subtype of the source.Di2015NewLine    if (source.GetType() != target.GetType())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Objects must be of the same type");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var prop in source.GetType()Di2015NewLine                               .GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance |Di2015NewLine                                              BindingFlags.Public)Di2015NewLine                               .Where(p => !p.GetIndexParameters().Any())Di2015NewLine                               .Where(p => p.CanRead && p.CanWrite))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var value = prop.GetValue(source, null);Di2015NewLine        if (value != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prop.SetValue(target, value, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13218133Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct HttpParamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _key;Di2015NewLine    private string _value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Key { get { return HttpUtilty.UrlEncode(_key); } set { _key = value; } }Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get { return HttpUtility.UrlEncode(_value); } set { _value = value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpParam(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _key = key;Di2015NewLine        _value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0}={1}", Key, Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine

13219154Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MineSweeperControl : Panel {Di2015NewLine  private int columns = 16;Di2015NewLine  private int rows = 12;Di2015NewLine  private Mine[,] mines;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public MineSweeperControl() {Di2015NewLine    this.DoubleBuffered = true;Di2015NewLine    this.ResizeRedraw = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // initialize mine field:Di2015NewLine    mines = new Mine[columns, rows];Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < rows; ++y) {Di2015NewLine      int left = 0;Di2015NewLine      int height = (this.ClientSize.Height - top) / (rows - y);Di2015NewLine      for (int x = 0; x < columns; ++x) {Di2015NewLine        int width = (this.ClientSize.Width - left) / (columns - x);Di2015NewLine        mines[x, y].Bounds = new Rectangle(left, top, width, height);Di2015NewLine        left += width;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      top += height;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    base.OnResize(e);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    e.Graphics.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < rows; ++y) {Di2015NewLine      for (int x = 0; x < columns; ++x) {Di2015NewLine        if (mines[x, y].Bounds.Contains(e.Location)) {Di2015NewLine          mines[x, y].IsRevealed = true;Di2015NewLine          this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine          MessageBox.Show(Di2015NewLine            string.Format("You pressed on button ({0}, {1})",Di2015NewLine            x.ToString(), y.ToString())Di2015NewLine          );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    base.OnMouseDown(e);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13219755Di2015UniqueSeparatorif
13219755Di2015UniqueSeparatorIRequestHandler<TRequest, TResponse>
13219755Di2015UniqueSeparatorTRequest
13219755Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass RequestResponseFactory : IRequestResponseFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<Type, Type> _requestHandlerTypes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RequestResponseFactory()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _requestHandlerTypes =Di2015NewLine            typeof(RequestResponseFactory).Assembly.GetTypes()Di2015NewLine                .Where(t => !t.IsAbstract)Di2015NewLine                .Select(t => newDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HandlerType = t,Di2015NewLine                    RequestType = GetHandledRequestType(t)Di2015NewLine                })Di2015NewLine                .Where(x => x.RequestType != null)Di2015NewLine                .ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine                    x => x.RequestType,Di2015NewLine                    x => x.HandlerTypeDi2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Type GetHandledRequestType(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handlerInterface = type.GetInterfaces()Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault(i =>Di2015NewLine                i.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine                i.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(IRequestHandler<,>));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return handlerInterface == null ? null : handlerInterface.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TResponse ProcessRequest<TRequest, TResponse>(TRequest request) where TRequest : IRequestData<TResponse>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_requestHandlerTypes.ContainsKey(typeof(TRequest)))Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException("No handler registered for type: " + typeof(TRequest).FullName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var handlerType = _requestHandlerTypes[typeof(TRequest)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var handler = (IRequestHandler<TRequest, TResponse>)Activator.CreateInstance(handlerType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return handler.ProcessRequest(request);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13221129Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool matchIt(string input)//returns true|false for a matchDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(input=="0")return false;//cuz you dont want to match 0Di2015NewLine    string[] parts=input.Split(new char[] { ',','-' }, StringSplitOptions.None);//split themDi2015NewLine    int prev=int.Parse(parts[0]);Di2015NewLine    foreach(string s in parts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(prev>int.Parse(s))return false;Di2015NewLine        prev=int.Parse(s);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

for documents closeDi2015NewLine            wordApplication.DocumentBeforeClose += WordApplicationDocumentBeforeClose;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            wordApplication.Quit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void WordApplicationDocumentBeforeClose(Document doc, ref bool cancel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OpenDocuments.Remove(doc);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(doc.Name + " closed!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void WordApplicationDocumentOpen(Document doc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If this returns true, the doc is not in the set of open documents, hence the doc is not already openDi2015NewLine            if(OpenDocuments.Add(doc))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OpenDocuments.Add(doc);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(doc.Name + " opened...");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Otherwise, the doc is already in the set of open documents, hence we know the document is already openDi2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(doc.Name + " is already open!");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13234720Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void StartServer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TcpListener listener = null;Di2015NewLine    TcpClient client = null;Di2015NewLine    NetworkStream nwStream = null; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        listener = new TcpListener(IPAddress.Any, 4444);Di2015NewLine        listener.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    { Console.WriteLine(ex.Message); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool waiting = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(waiting)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(listener.Pending())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                client = listener.AcceptTcpClient();Di2015NewLine                nwStream = client.GetStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using(var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    CreateDataSet().WriteXml(ms);Di2015NewLine                    ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    int read = 0;Di2015NewLine                    while((read = ms.Read(buffer, 0, 1024)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        nwStream.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                nwStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine                nwStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                client.Close();Di2015NewLine                waiting = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate DataSet CreateDataSet()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Create your dataset here and return somethingDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13234825Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ElementHolderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<Element> ElementsList { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private ExternalService _externalService = new ExternalService();Di2015NewLine    private IDisposable _elementSubscription;Di2015NewLine    private Subject<Element> _elementSubject = new Subject<Element>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ElementHolder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _externalService.ReceivedNewElement += _elementSubject.OnNext;Di2015NewLine        _externalService.Subscribe();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ElementList = new ObservableCollection<Element>();Di2015NewLine        _elementSubscription = _externalService.ObserveOnDispatcher().Subscribe(NextElement);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void NextElement(Element e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Element item = ElementsList.FirstOrDefault(o => o.ID == element.ID);Di2015NewLine        if (item == null) {Di2015NewLine            _elementList.Add(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            item.Update(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13236141Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] Serialize(object myObject)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = myObject.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var id = System.Text.ASCIIEncoding.ASCII.GetBytes(type.FullName + '|');Di2015NewLine        ms.Write(id, 0, id.Length);Di2015NewLine        Serializer.Serialize(ms, myObject);Di2015NewLine        var bytes = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        return bytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic object Deserialize(byte[] serializedData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    using (var ms = new MemoryStream(serializedData))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var currentChar = (char)ms.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            if (currentChar == '|')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sb.Append(currentChar);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string typeName = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // assuming that the calling assembly contains the desired type.Di2015NewLine        // You can include aditional assembly information if necessaryDi2015NewLine        Type deserializationType = Assembly.GetCallingAssembly().GetType(typeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo mi = typeof(Serializer).GetMethod("Deserialize");Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo genericMethod = mi.MakeGenericMethod(new[] { deserializationType });Di2015NewLine        return genericMethod.Invoke(null, new[] { ms });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13237249Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class | AttributeTargets.Property, AllowMultiple = true, Inherited = true)]Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class PropertiesMustMatchAttribute : ValidationAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string _defaultErrorMessage = "'{0}' and '{1}' do not match.";Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _typeId = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PropertiesMustMatchAttribute(string originalProperty, string confirmProperty)Di2015NewLine        : base(_defaultErrorMessage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OriginalProperty = originalProperty;Di2015NewLine        ConfirmProperty = confirmProperty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ConfirmProperty { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string OriginalProperty { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object TypeIdDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _typeId;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string FormatErrorMessage(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, ErrorMessageString,Di2015NewLine            OriginalProperty, ConfirmProperty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsValid(object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptorCollection properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(value);Di2015NewLine        object originalValue = properties.Find(OriginalProperty, true /* ignoreCase */).GetValue(value);Di2015NewLine        object confirmValue = properties.Find(ConfirmProperty, true /* ignoreCase */).GetValue(value);Di2015NewLine        return Object.Equals(originalValue, confirmValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13237269Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Foo Edit(Foo newFoo)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dbFoo = context.FooDi2015NewLine                       .Include(x => x.SubFoo)Di2015NewLine                       .Include(x => x.AnotherSubFoo)Di2015NewLine                       .Single(c => c.Id == newFoo.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.Entry(dbFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newFoo);Di2015NewLine    context.Entry(dbFoo.SubFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newFoo.SubFoo);Di2015NewLine    context.Entry(dbFoo.AnotherSubFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newFoo.AnotherSubFoo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newFoo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13237269Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Foo Edit(Foo newFoo)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dbFoo = context.FooDi2015NewLine                       .Include(x => x.SubFoo)Di2015NewLine                       .Include(x => x.AnotherSubFoo)Di2015NewLine                       .Single(c => c.Id == newFoo.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.Entry(dbFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newFoo);Di2015NewLine    if (dbFoo.SubFoo != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (newFoo.SubFoo != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (dbFoo.SubFoo.Id == newFoo.SubFoo.Id)Di2015NewLine                // no relationship change, only scalar prop.Di2015NewLine                context.Entry(dbFoo.SubFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newFoo.SubFoo);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Relationship changeDi2015NewLine                // Attach assumes that newFoo.SubFoo is an existing entityDi2015NewLine                context.SubFoos.Attach(newFoo.SubFoo);Di2015NewLine                dbFoo.SubFoo = newFoo.SubFoo;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else // relationship has been removedDi2015NewLine            dbFoo.SubFoo = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (newFoo.SubFoo != null) // relationship has been addedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Attach assumes that newFoo.SubFoo is an existing entityDi2015NewLine            context.SubFoos.Attach(newFoo.SubFoo);Di2015NewLine            dbFoo.SubFoo = newFoo.SubFoo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // else -> old and new SubFoo is null -> nothing to doDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the same logic for AnotherSubFoo ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newFoo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13237269Di2015UniqueSeparatorModified
13237269Di2015UniqueSeparatorFoo.SubFoo
13237269Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Foo Edit(Foo newFoo)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dbFoo = context.FooDi2015NewLine                       .Include(x => x.SubFoo)Di2015NewLine                       .Include(x => x.AnotherSubFoo)Di2015NewLine                       .Single(c => c.Id == newFoo.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Update foo (works only for scalar properties)Di2015NewLine    context.Entry(dbFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newFoo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Delete subFoos from database that are not in the newFoo.SubFoo collectionDi2015NewLine    foreach (var dbSubFoo in dbFoo.SubFoo.ToList())Di2015NewLine        if (!newFoo.SubFoo.Any(s => s.Id == dbSubFoo.Id))Di2015NewLine            db.SubFoos.Remove(dbSubFoo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var newSubFoo in newFoo.SubFoo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dbSubFoo = dbFoo.SubFoo.SingleOrDefault(s => s.Id == newSubFoo.Id);Di2015NewLine        if (dbSubFoo != null)Di2015NewLine            // Update subFoos that are in the newFoo.SubFoo collectionDi2015NewLine            context.Entry(dbSubFoo).CurrentValues.SetValues(newSubFoo);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            // Insert subFoos into the database that are notDi2015NewLine            // in the dbFoo.subFoo collectionDi2015NewLine            dbFoo.SubFoo.Add(newSubFoo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // and the same for AnotherSubFoo...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    db.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newFoo;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13240187Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IHaveParentEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   ParentEntity ParentEntity { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Expression<Func<TChildEntity, bool>> GetParentWhere<TChildEntity>(string searchText) Di2015NewLine   where TChildEntity : IHaveParentEntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int intSearchText;Di2015NewLine   bool isInt = int.TryParse(searchText, out intSearchText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   DateTime dateSearchText;Di2015NewLine   bool isDate = DateTime.TryParse(searchText, out dateSearchText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   SubmissionStatus submissionStatus;Di2015NewLine   bool isStatus = Enum.TryParse(searchText, true, out submissionStatus);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return child => Di2015NewLine      child.ParentEntity.CreationUser.Contains(searchText) ||Di2015NewLine      ...Di2015NewLine   ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn crudEngine.Read<ChildEntity>()Di2015NewLine    .Include(parameters => parameters.ParentEntity)Di2015NewLine    .Where(GetParentWhere<ChildEntity>(searchText));Di2015NewLine
13240187Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Expression<Func<TChildEntity, bool>> GetParentWhere<TChildEntity>(Di2015NewLine   Expression<Func<TChildEntity, ParentEntity>> parentSelector, Di2015NewLine   string searchText)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   int intSearchText;Di2015NewLine   bool isInt = int.TryParse(searchText, out intSearchText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   DateTime dateSearchText;Di2015NewLine   bool isDate = DateTime.TryParse(searchText, out dateSearchText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   SubmissionStatus submissionStatus;Di2015NewLine   bool isStatus = Enum.TryParse(searchText, true, out submissionStatus);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Expression<Func<ParentEntity, bool>> predicate = parent => Di2015NewLine      parent.CreationUser.Contains(searchText) ||Di2015NewLine      ...Di2015NewLine   ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Expression body = ReplacementVisitor.Replace(Di2015NewLine      predicate, Di2015NewLine      predicate.Parameters[0], Di2015NewLine      parentSelector.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return Expression.Lambda<Func<TChildEntity, bool>>(body, Di2015NewLine      parentSelector.Parameters[0]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate sealed class ReplacementVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  private IList<ParameterExpression> SourceParameters { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  private Expression ToFind { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  private Expression ToReplace { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression Replace(Di2015NewLine      LambdaExpression source, Di2015NewLine      Expression toFind, Di2015NewLine      Expression toReplace)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     var visitor = new ReplacementVisitorDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        SourceParameters = source.Parameters,Di2015NewLine        ToFind = toFind,Di2015NewLine        ToReplace = toReplace,Di2015NewLine     };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     return visitor.Visit(source.Body);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private Expression ReplaceNode(Expression node)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     return (node == ToFind) ? ToReplace : node;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     if (SourceParameters.Contains(node)) return ReplaceNode(node);Di2015NewLine     return SourceParameters.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name == node.Name) ?? node;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn crudEngine.Read<ChildEntity>()Di2015NewLine    .Include(parameters => parameters.ParentEntity)Di2015NewLine    .Where(GetParentWhere<ChildEntity>(child => child.ParentEntity, searchText));Di2015NewLine
