13240877Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SendStuffDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly HttpWebRequest _request;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<string, string> _kparams;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Dictionary<string, FileStream> _kfiles;Di2015NewLine        readonly string _boundary = "---------------------------" + DateTime.Now.Ticks.ToString("x");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public SendStuff(Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request, Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, string> kparams, Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, FileStream> kfiles)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _request = request;Di2015NewLine            _kparams = kparams;Di2015NewLine            _kfiles = kfiles;Di2015NewLine            _request.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + _boundary;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Do()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Based on HTTP 1.1, if the server can determine the content length, it need not insist onDi2015NewLine            // us sending one. If you are talkingDi2015NewLine            // to a "special" server, construct the headers beforehand, measure their lengthDi2015NewLine            // and identify the file lengths of the files to be sent.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var reqStream = _request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine            using (var writer = new StreamWriter(reqStream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.NewLine = "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLine                WriteBoundary(writer);Di2015NewLine                WriteParams(writer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var file in _kfiles)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"; filename=\\"{1}\\"", Di2015NewLine                        file.Key, Di2015NewLine                        Path.GetFileName(file.Value.Name));Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine("Content-Type: application/octet-stream");Di2015NewLine                    writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    WriteTheFileContent(reqStream, file.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    WriteBoundary(writer);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void WriteTheFileContent(Stream reqStream, Stream fileStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine            var buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine            while ((bytesRead = fileStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine                reqStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void WriteParams(StreamWriter writer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var param in _kparams)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"{0}\\"", param.Key);Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteLine(param.Value);Di2015NewLine                WriteBoundary(writer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void WriteBoundary(TextWriter writer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("\\r\\n--{0}\\r\\n", _boundary);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13249928Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TextStream : Stream {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly String text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly Int32 bitsPerLine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  readonly StringBuilder buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Int32 textPosition;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Initialize a readable stream.Di2015NewLine  public TextStream(String text) {Di2015NewLine    if (text == null)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentNullException("text");Di2015NewLine    this.text = text;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Initialize a writeable stream.Di2015NewLine  public TextStream(Int32 bitsPerLine) {Di2015NewLine    if (bitsPerLine <= 0)Di2015NewLine      throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    this.bitsPerLine = bitsPerLine;Di2015NewLine    this.buffer = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Boolean CanRead { get { return this.text != null; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Boolean CanWrite { get { return this.buffer != null; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Boolean CanSeek { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int64 Length { get { throw new InvalidOperationException(); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int64 Position {Di2015NewLine    get { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine    set { throw new InvalidOperationException(); }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Flush() {Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int32 Read(Byte[] buffer, Int32 offset, Int32 count) {Di2015NewLine    // TODO: Validate buffer, offset and count.Di2015NewLine    if (!CanRead)Di2015NewLine      throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var byteCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    Byte currentByte = 0;Di2015NewLine    var bitCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (; byteCount < count && this.textPosition < this.text.Length; this.textPosition += 1) {Di2015NewLine      if (text[this.textPosition] != '0' && text[this.textPosition] != '1')Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine      currentByte = (Byte) ((currentByte << 1) | (this.text[this.textPosition] == '0' ? 0 : 1));Di2015NewLine      bitCount += 1;Di2015NewLine      if (bitCount == 8) {Di2015NewLine        buffer[offset + byteCount] = currentByte;Di2015NewLine        byteCount += 1;Di2015NewLine        currentByte = 0;Di2015NewLine        bitCount = 0;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (bitCount > 0) {Di2015NewLine      buffer[offset + byteCount] = currentByte;Di2015NewLine      byteCount += 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return byteCount;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void Write(Byte[] buffer, Int32 offset, Int32 count) {Di2015NewLine    // TODO: Validate buffer, offset and count.Di2015NewLine    if (!CanWrite)Di2015NewLine      throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < count; ++i) {Di2015NewLine      var currentByte = buffer[offset + i];Di2015NewLine      for (var mask = 0x80; mask > 0; mask /= 2) {Di2015NewLine        if (this.buffer.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine          if ((this.buffer.Length + 1)%(2*this.bitsPerLine) == 0)Di2015NewLine            this.buffer.Append('\\n');Di2015NewLine          elseDi2015NewLine            this.buffer.Append(',');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.buffer.Append((currentByte & mask) == 0 ? '0' : '1');Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override String ToString() {Di2015NewLine    if (this.text != null)Di2015NewLine      return this.text;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      return this.buffer.ToString();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override Int64 Seek(Int64 offset, SeekOrigin origin) {Di2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override void SetLength(Int64 length) {Di2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13249928Di2015UniqueSeparatorDeflateStream
13249928Di2015UniqueSeparatorString Compress(String text) {Di2015NewLine  using (var inputStream = new TextStream(text))Di2015NewLine    using (var outputStream = new MemoryStream()) {Di2015NewLine      using (var compressedStream = new DeflateStream(outputStream, CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine        inputStream.CopyTo(compressedStream);Di2015NewLine      return Convert.ToBase64String(outputStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineString Decompress(String compressedText, Int32 bitsPerLine) {Di2015NewLine  var bytes = Convert.FromBase64String(compressedText);Di2015NewLine  using (var inputStream = new MemoryStream(bytes))Di2015NewLine    using (var outputStream = new TextStream(bitsPerLine)) {Di2015NewLine      using (var compressedStream = new DeflateStream(inputStream, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        compressedStream.CopyTo(outputStream);Di2015NewLine      return outputStream.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13249928Di2015UniqueSeparatorString CreateRandomString(Int32 width, Int32 height) {Di2015NewLine  var random = new Random(0);Di2015NewLine  var stringBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine  for (var i = 0; i < width; ++i) {Di2015NewLine    for (var j = 0; j < height; ++j) {Di2015NewLine      if (i > 0 && j == 0)Di2015NewLine        stringBuilder.Append('\\n');Di2015NewLine      else if (j > 0)Di2015NewLine        stringBuilder.Append(',');Di2015NewLine      stringBuilder.Append(random.Next(2) == 0 ? '0' : '1');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return stringBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13251162Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static byte[] SimpleEncrypt(string value, string key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var simpleAlgorithm = GetSimpleAlgorithm(key);Di2015NewLine    CryptographicKey encryptKey = simpleAlgorithm.Item1;Di2015NewLine    IBuffer IV = simpleAlgorithm.Item2;Di2015NewLine    var encryptedBuffer = CryptographicEngine.Encrypt(encryptKey, CryptographicBuffer.ConvertStringToBinary(value, BinaryStringEncoding.Utf8), IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = new byte[encryptedBuffer.Length];Di2015NewLine    CryptographicBuffer.CopyToByteArray(encryptedBuffer, out result);Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Tuple<CryptographicKey, IBuffer> GetSimpleAlgorithm(string key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var provider = SymmetricKeyAlgorithmProvider.OpenAlgorithm(SymmetricAlgorithmNames.AesCbcPkcs7);Di2015NewLine    var keyAsBinary = CryptographicBuffer.ConvertStringToBinary(key, BinaryStringEncoding.Utf8);Di2015NewLine    var source = HashAlgorithmProvider.OpenAlgorithm(HashAlgorithmNames.Sha256).HashData(keyAsBinary);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] sourceArray = new byte[source.Length];Di2015NewLine    CryptographicBuffer.CopyToByteArray(source, out sourceArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var shortKey = CryptographicBuffer.CreateFromByteArray(sourceArray.Take((int)provider.BlockLength).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new Tuple<CryptographicKey,IBuffer>(provider.CreateSymmetricKey(source), shortKey);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13255957Di2015UniqueSeparator    //Fisher-Yates_shuffle http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisher-Yates_shuffleDi2015NewLine    private static readonly ThreadLocal<Random> RandomThreadLocal =Di2015NewLine        new ThreadLocal<Random>(() => new Random());Di2015NewLine    public static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list, int seed = -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var r = seed >= 0 ? new Random(seed) : RandomThreadLocal.Value;Di2015NewLine        var len = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = len - 1; i >= 1; --i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var j = r.Next(i);Di2015NewLine            var tmp = list[i];Di2015NewLine            list[i] = list[j];Di2015NewLine            list[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
13255957Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static readonly ThreadLocal<Random> RandomThreadLocal =Di2015NewLine        new ThreadLocal<Random>(() => new Random());Di2015NewLine    public static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list, int seed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.Shuffle(new Random(seed));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.Shuffle(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list, Random rand)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var r = rand ?? RandomThreadLocal.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var len = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = len - 1; i >= 1; --i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var j = r.Next(i);Di2015NewLine            var tmp = list[i];Di2015NewLine            list[i] = list[j];Di2015NewLine            list[j] = tmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

_sensorChooser = new KinectSensorChooser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DataContext = this;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (DesignerProperties.GetIsInDesignMode(this))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // do something special, only for design modeDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                KinectSensorManager = new KinectSensorManager();Di2015NewLine null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show("Unable to detect an available Kinect Sensor");Di2015NewLine                    Application.Current.Shutdown();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Bind the KinectSensor from the sensorChooser to the KinectSensor on the KinectSensorManagerDi2015NewLine                var kinectSensorBinding = new Binding("Kinect") { Source = _sensorChooser };Di2015NewLine                BindingOperations.SetBinding(this.KinectSensorManager, KinectSensorManager.KinectSensorProperty, kinectSensorBinding);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Kinect Discovery & SetupDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnKinectSensorChanged(object sender, KinectSensorManagerEventArgs<KinectSensor> args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (null != args.OldValue)Di2015NewLine                UninitializeKinectServices(args.OldValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (null != args.NewValue)Di2015NewLine                InitializeKinectServices(KinectSensorManager, args.NewValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initialize Kinect based services.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="kinectSensorManager"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="sensor"></param>Di2015NewLine        private void InitializeKinectServices(KinectSensorManager kinectSensorManager, KinectSensor sensor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // configure the color streamDi2015NewLine            kinectSensorManager.ColorFormat = ColorImageFormat.RgbResolution640x480Fps30;Di2015NewLine            kinectSensorManager.ColorStreamEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // configure the depth streamDi2015NewLine            kinectSensorManager.DepthStreamEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            kinectSensorManager.TransformSmoothParameters =Di2015NewLine                new TransformSmoothParametersDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // as the smoothing value is increased responsiveness to the raw dataDi2015NewLine                    // decreases; therefore, increased smoothing leads to increased latency.Di2015NewLine                    Smoothing = 0.5f,Di2015NewLine                    // higher value corrects toward the raw data more quickly,Di2015NewLine                    // a lower value corrects more slowly and appears smoother.Di2015NewLine                    Correction = 0.5f,Di2015NewLine                    // number of frames to predict into the future.Di2015NewLine                    Prediction = 0.5f,Di2015NewLine                    // determines how aggressively to remove jitter from the raw data.Di2015NewLine                    JitterRadius = 0.05f,Di2015NewLine                    // maximum radius (in meters) that filtered positions can deviate from raw data.Di2015NewLine                    MaxDeviationRadius = 0.04fDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // configure the skeleton streamDi2015NewLine            kinectSensorManager.SkeletonStreamEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // enable the sensorDi2015NewLine            kinectSensorManager.KinectSensorEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Uninitialize all Kinect services that were initialized in InitializeKinectServices.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregion Kinect Discovery & SetupDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region PropertiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public KinectSensorManager 13260186Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate TreeNode CheckForSubFolders(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TreeNode folder = new TreeNode(path);Di2015NewLine        string dir = path.TrimEnd(new char[] { '\\\\' });Di2015NewLine        int index = dir.LastIndexOf('\\\\');Di2015NewLine        folder.Text = dir.Substring(index + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //But I think that it is OK to use folder.Text = Path.GetFileName(path); Di2015NewLine        //since the filename of some file will never be passed to the CheckForSubFolders method         Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var subdirectory in Directory.GetDirectories(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            folder.Nodes.Add(CheckForSubFolders(subdirectory));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        folder.ImageIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        folder.SelectedImageIndex = 1;Di2015NewLine        return folder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13260265Di2015UniqueSeparatorcase 4: // EllipsfillDi2015NewLine    double radiusx = Math.Abs((double)End.X - (double)Begin.X) / 2.0;Di2015NewLine    double radiusy = Math.Abs((double)End.Y - (double)Begin.Y) / 2.0;Di2015NewLine    double midpointx = ((double)Begin.X + (double)End.X) / 2.0;Di2015NewLine    double midpointy = ((double)Begin.Y + (double)End.Y) / 2.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn ((Math.Pow((p.X -midpointx) / radiusx, 2) + Math.Pow((p.Y - midpointy) / radiusy, 2)) < 1.0);Di2015NewLine

13260469Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void CompareWhichIsBetter(int numTypedDigits)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Number of typed digits: " + numTypedDigits);Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random(DateTime.Now.Millisecond);Di2015NewLine    int countDecimalIsBetter = 0;Di2015NewLine    int countDirectIsBetter = 0;Di2015NewLine    int countEqual = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double origDouble = rnd.NextDouble();Di2015NewLine        //Use the line below for the user-typed-in-numbers case.Di2015NewLine        //double origDouble = Math.Round(rnd.NextDouble(), numTypedDigits); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float x = (float)origDouble;Di2015NewLine        double viaFloatAndDecimal = (double)Convert.ToDecimal(x);Di2015NewLine        double viaFloat = x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double diff1 = Math.Abs(origDouble - viaFloatAndDecimal);Di2015NewLine        double diff2 = Math.Abs(origDouble - viaFloat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (diff1 < diff2)Di2015NewLine            countDecimalIsBetter++;Di2015NewLine        else if (diff1 > diff2)Di2015NewLine            countDirectIsBetter++;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            countEqual++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Decimal better: " + countDecimalIsBetter);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Direct better: " + countDirectIsBetter);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Equal: " + countEqual);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Betterness of direct conversion: " + (double)countDirectIsBetter / countDecimalIsBetter);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Betterness of conv. via decimal: " + (double)countDecimalIsBetter / countDirectIsBetter );Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13262294Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Duration : IEquatable<Duration>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected double _length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or Sets the duration in Miliseconds.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public virtual double LengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _length; }Di2015NewLine        set { _length = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // removed all the other code that as it was irrelevantDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Duration other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // First two lines are just optimizationsDi2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, other)) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, other)) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _length.Equals(other._length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Again just optimizationDi2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj)) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, obj)) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Actually check the type, should not throw exception from Equals overrideDi2015NewLine        if (obj.GetType() != this.GetType()) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Call the implementation from IEquatableDi2015NewLine        return Equals((Duration) obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Constant because equals tests mutable member.Di2015NewLine        // This will give poor hash performance, but will prevent bugs.Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13262978Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface MyListener { // This is probably your MyEventDi2015NewLine    void myEventFired(Object sender, MyEventArgs eventArgs);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyEventArgs {Di2015NewLine    ...something...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13262978Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClass {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MyListener listener = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This is a method which sometimes fires an event, by calling the fireEvent() method belowDi2015NewLine    public void doSomething() {Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLine        if (something) {Di2015NewLine            // Let's say the event happens if "something" is true. Di2015NewLine            // So now we "fire the event". What "firing the event" means, Di2015NewLine            // is just to call the "myEventFired" method in the listener.Di2015NewLine            fireEvent();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is called from the method above to fire the event - i.e. to tell the listener that the event has happenedDi2015NewLine    protected void fireEvent() {Di2015NewLine        if (listener != null) {Di2015NewLine            Object sender = this; Di2015NewLine            MyEventArgs eventArgs = new MyEventArgs(...something...);Di2015NewLine            listener.myEventFired(sender, eventArgs);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This method is called by the listener, to register itself as listener on this object.Di2015NewLine    // MyClass remembers the listener in the "listener" instance variable, so that Di2015NewLine    // when the event happens at some later point in time, it knows which object it  Di2015NewLine    // has to tell it to.Di2015NewLine    public void setMyListener(MyListener listener) {Di2015NewLine        this.listener = listener;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13262978Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<MyListener> listeners
13262978Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyListener listener
13262978Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyListeningClass implements MyListener {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyListeningClass() {Di2015NewLine        MyClass myClass = ...get the MyClass object from somewhere...;Di2015NewLine        myClass.setMyListener(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is called by MyClass when the event occursDi2015NewLine    public void myEventFired(Object sender, MyEventArgs eventArgs) {Di2015NewLine        System.out.println("EVENT HAPPENED!");Di2015NewLine        System.out.println("Sender is: "+sender);Di2015NewLine        System.out.println("MyEventArgs are: "+eventArgs);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13263270Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PagingList<T> : List<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int PageIndex { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int PageSize { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int TotalCount { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int TotalPages { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string pagerange { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int pagingrange { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PagingList(IQueryable<T> data, int page, int pagesize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PageIndex = page;Di2015NewLine        PageSize = pagesize;Di2015NewLine        TotalCount = data.Count();Di2015NewLine        TotalPages = (int)Math.Ceiling(TotalCount /(double)PageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.AddRange(data.Skip(PageIndex * PageSize).Take(PageSize));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //public void GeneratePageRange()Di2015NewLine    //{Di2015NewLine    //    for (int i = 1; i <= TotalPages; i++)Di2015NewLine    //    {Di2015NewLine    //        pagingrange = iDi2015NewLine    //    }Di2015NewLine    //}Di2015NewLine    public bool HasPreviousPageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (PageIndex > 0); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool HasNextPageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (PageIndex + 1 < TotalPages); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13263830Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SafeActionSetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Object _sync = new Object();Di2015NewLine    List<Action> _actions = new List<Action>(); //The main storeDi2015NewLine    List<Action> _delta = new List<Action>();   //Temporary buffer for storing added values while the main store is being enumeratedDi2015NewLine    int _lock = 0; //The number of concurrent Invoke enumerationsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (0 == _lock)Di2015NewLine            { //_actions list is not being enumerated and can be modifiedDi2015NewLine                _actions.Add(action);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            { //_actions list is being enumerated and cannot be modifiedDi2015NewLine                _delta.Add(action); //Storing the new values in the _delta bufferDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Invoke()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock(sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (0 < _delta.Count)Di2015NewLine            { //Re-entering Invoke after calling Add:  Invoke->Add,InvokeDi2015NewLine                Debug.Assert(0 < _lock);Di2015NewLine                var newActions = new List<Action>(_actions); //Creating a new list for merging deltaDi2015NewLine                newActions.AddRange(_delta); //Merging the deltaDi2015NewLine                _delta.Clear();Di2015NewLine                _actions = newActions; //Replacing the original list (which is still being iterated)Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ++_lock;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var action in _actions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        lock(sync)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            --_lock;Di2015NewLine            if ((0 == _lock) && (0 < _delta.Count))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _actions.AddRange(_delta); //Merging the deltaDi2015NewLine                _delta.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13264154Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string textFormater2(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] lines = Regex.Split(input, "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine        int tabCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (StringReader sr = new StringReader(input))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string l;Di2015NewLine            while (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(l = sr.ReadLine()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (l.Substring(0, 1) == "[")Di2015NewLine                    if (l.Contains('/'))Di2015NewLine                        tabCount--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string tabs = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < tabCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                    tabs += "\\t";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                output.AppendLine(tabs + l);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (l.Substring(0, 1) == "[")Di2015NewLine                    if (!l.Contains('/'))Di2015NewLine                        tabCount++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13269082Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (dialPressed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Get the current mouse position relative to the dialDi2015NewLine  // I was doing this relative to the dial that was turning, which is wrong. Di2015NewLine  // The position of the pointer relative to the dial will change as the dial turns!Di2015NewLine  // I created a static dial behind it, the same dimensionsDi2015NewLine  Windows.UI.Input.PointerPoint currentLocation = Di2015NewLine                                e.GetCurrentPoint(this.dial_Static); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Point dialCenter = Di2015NewLine        new Point(this.dial.ActualHeight / 2, this.dial.ActualWidth / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Calculate an angleDi2015NewLine  double radians = Math.Atan((currentLocation.Position.Y - dialCenter.Y) /                           Di2015NewLine                             (currentLocation.Position.X - dialCenter.X));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // in order to get these figures to work, I actually had to *add* 90 degrees to it,     Di2015NewLine  // and *subtract* 180 from it if the X coord is negative. Di2015NewLine  double x = (radians * 180 / Math.PI) + 90;Di2015NewLine  if ((currentLocation.Position.X - dialCenter.X) < 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     x = x - 180;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  RotateTransform r = new RotateTransform();Di2015NewLine  r.Angle = x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  TransformGroup t = new TransformGroup();Di2015NewLine  t.Children.Add(r);Di2015NewLine  dial.RenderTransform = t;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13270302Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetValue(object inputObject, string propertyName, object propertyVal)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //find out the typeDi2015NewLine    Type type = inputObject.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get the property information based on the typeDi2015NewLine    System.Reflection.PropertyInfo propertyInfo = type.GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //find the property typeDi2015NewLine    Type propertyType = propertyInfo.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Convert.ChangeType does not handle conversion to nullable typesDi2015NewLine    //if the property type is nullable, we need to get the underlying type of the propertyDi2015NewLine    var targetType = IsNullableType(propertyInfo.PropertyType) ? Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(propertyInfo.PropertyType) : propertyInfo.PropertyType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Returns an System.Object with the specified System.Type and whose value isDi2015NewLine    //equivalent to the specified object.Di2015NewLine    propertyVal = Convert.ChangeType(propertyVal, targetType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Set the value of the propertyDi2015NewLine    propertyInfo.SetValue(inputObject, propertyVal, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static bool IsNullableType(Type type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return type.IsGenericType && type.GetGenericTypeDefinition().Equals(typeof(Nullable<>));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
13270302Di2015UniqueSeparatorPropertyInfo info = t.GetProperty("Value");Di2015NewLineobject value = null;Di2015NewLinetry Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    value = System.Convert.ChangeType(123, Di2015NewLine        Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(info.PropertyType));Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLinecatch (InvalidCastException)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepropertyInfo.SetValue(obj, value, null);Di2015NewLine

13270794Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class classHasherDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /**********Di2015NewLine        *   recursive folder MD5 hash of a dirDi2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLine        MD5 hashAlgo = null;Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb;Di2015NewLine        public classHasher()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hashAlgo = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string UltraHasher(String path)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            /**********Di2015NewLine            *   recursive folder MD5 hash of a dirDi2015NewLine            */Di2015NewLine            if (!Directory.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return  getHashOverFile(path);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<string> filemd5s = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            List<string> dir = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Directory.GetDirectories(path) != null) foreach (var d in Directory.GetDirectories(path))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dir.Add(d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (Directory.GetFiles(path) != null) foreach (var f in Directory.GetFiles(path))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dir.Add(f);                Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            dir.Sort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string entry in dir)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Directory.Exists(entry))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string rtn = UltraHasher(entry.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    //Debug.WriteLine("   ULTRRAAHASHER:! " + entry.ToString() + ":" + rtn);Di2015NewLine                    filemd5s.Add(rtn); Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine                if (File.Exists(entry))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string rtn = getHashOverFile(entry.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    //Debug.WriteLine("   FILEEEEHASHER:! " + entry.ToString() + ":" + rtn);Di2015NewLine                    filemd5s.Add(rtn);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Debug.WriteLine("   ULTRRAASUMMMM:! " + String.Join("", filemd5s.ToArray()));Di2015NewLine            string tosend = CalculateMD5Hash(String.Join("", filemd5s.ToArray()));Di2015NewLine            //Debug.WriteLine("   YEAHHAHHAHHAH:! " + tosend);Di2015NewLine            return tosend;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string getHashOverFile(String filename)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            getFileHash(filename);Di2015NewLine            return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private void getFileHash(String f)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream file = new FileStream(f, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] retVal = hashAlgo.ComputeHash(file);Di2015NewLine                file.Close();Di2015NewLine                foreach (var y in retVal)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(y.ToString("x2"));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public string CalculateMD5Hash(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] inputBytes = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(input);Di2015NewLine            byte[] hash = hashAlgo.ComputeHash(inputBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringBuilder sz = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < hash.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sz.Append(hash[i].ToString("x2"));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return sz.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
13270794Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction md5_dir($dir){Di2015NewLine        /**********Di2015NewLine        *   recursive folder MD5 hash of a dirDi2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLine        if (!is_dir($dir)){Di2015NewLine            return  md5_file($dir);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        $filemd5s = array();Di2015NewLine        $bit = array();Di2015NewLine        $d = scandir($dir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach($d as $entry){Di2015NewLine            if ($entry != '.' && $entry != '..'){Di2015NewLine                 $bit[] = $entry;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        asort($bit);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach($bit as $entry){Di2015NewLine            if (is_dir($dir.'/'.$entry)){Di2015NewLine                $sz = md5_dir($dir.'/'.$entry);Di2015NewLine                //echo "\\n   ULTRRAAHASHER:! ".$dir.'/'.$entry.":$sz";Di2015NewLine                $filemd5s[] = $sz;Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine             else{Di2015NewLine                $sz = md5_file($dir.'/'.$entry);Di2015NewLine                $filemd5s[] = $sz;Di2015NewLine                //echo "\\n   FILEEEEHASHER:! ".$dir.'/'.$entry.":$sz";Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine        //echo "\\n   ULTRRAASUMMMM:! ".implode('', $filemd5s)."";Di2015NewLine        //echo "\\n   YEAHHAHHAHHAH:! ".md5(implode('', $filemd5s))."";Di2015NewLine        return md5(implode('', $filemd5s));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

13272817Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<Header, Detail>> UngroupParts(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<Header, Detail>> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var kvp in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Header header = kvp.Key;Di2015NewLine        List<string> parts = kvp.Value.Parts.ToList();Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<string> distinctParts = parts.Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine            Detail detail = new Detail() { Parts = distinctParts };Di2015NewLine            yield return new KeyValuePair<Header, Detail>(header, detail);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var part in distinctParts)Di2015NewLine                parts.Remove(part);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (parts.Any());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13273436Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DispatcherExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, DispatcherTimer> timers =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<string, DispatcherTimer>();Di2015NewLine    private static readonly object syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string DelayInvoke(this Dispatcher dispatcher, string namedInvocation,Di2015NewLine        Action action, TimeSpan delay,Di2015NewLine        DispatcherPriority priority = DispatcherPriority.Normal)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(namedInvocation))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                namedInvocation = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                RemoveTimer(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var timer = new DispatcherTimer(delay, priority, (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    RemoveTimer(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine                    action();Di2015NewLine                }, dispatcher);Di2015NewLine            timer.Start();Di2015NewLine            timers.Add(namedInvocation, timer);Di2015NewLine            return namedInvocation;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void CancelNamedInvocation(this Dispatcher dispatcher, string namedInvocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RemoveTimer(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void RemoveTimer(string namedInvocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!timers.ContainsKey(namedInvocation)) return;Di2015NewLine        timers[namedInvocation].Stop();Di2015NewLine        timers.Remove(namedInvocation);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

13273453Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace SocketUtilDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Net;Di2015NewLine    using System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLine    using System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLine    using System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Serializable]Di2015NewLine    public class SocketUtilException : ExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public SocketUtilException()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public SocketUtilException(string message)Di2015NewLine            : base(message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public SocketUtilException(string message, Exception inner)Di2015NewLine            : base(message, inner)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected SocketUtilException(Di2015NewLine            SerializationInfo info, StreamingContext context)Di2015NewLine            : base(info, context)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static class SocketUtilDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [StructLayoutAttribute(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine        public struct serventDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public string s_name;Di2015NewLine            public IntPtr s_aliases;Di2015NewLine            public ushort s_port;Di2015NewLine            public string s_proto;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("libc", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Ansi)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern IntPtr getservbyname(string name, string proto);Di2015NewLine        [DllImport("libc", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Ansi)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern IntPtr getservbyport(ushort port, string proto);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string GetServiceByPort(ushort port, string protocol, out List<string> aliases)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var netport = unchecked((ushort)IPAddress.HostToNetworkOrder(unchecked((short)port)));Di2015NewLine            var result = getservbyport(netport, protocol);Di2015NewLine            if (IntPtr.Zero == result)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new SocketUtilException(Di2015NewLine                    string.Format("Could not resolve service for port {0}", port));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var srvent = (servent)Marshal.PtrToStructure(result, typeof(servent));Di2015NewLine            aliases = GetAliases(srvent);Di2015NewLine            return srvent.s_name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<string> GetAliases(servent srvent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var aliases = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            if (srvent.s_aliases != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr cb;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (var i = 0;Di2015NewLine                    (cb = Marshal.ReadIntPtr(srvent.s_aliases, i)) != IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine                    i += Marshal.SizeOf(cb))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    aliases.Add(Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi(cb));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return aliases;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static ushort GetServiceByName(string service, string protocol, out List<string> aliases)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result = getservbyname(service, protocol);Di2015NewLine            if (IntPtr.Zero == result)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new SocketUtilException(Di2015NewLine                    string.Format("Could not resolve port for service {0}", service));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var srvent = (servent)Marshal.PtrToStructure(result, typeof(servent));Di2015NewLine            aliases = GetAliases(srvent);Di2015NewLine            var hostport = IPAddress.NetworkToHostOrder(unchecked((short)srvent.s_port));Di2015NewLine            return unchecked((ushort)hostport);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<string> aliases;Di2015NewLine                var port = SocketUtil.GetServiceByName("https", "tcp", out aliases);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("https runs on port {0}", port);Di2015NewLine                foreach (var alias in aliases)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(alias);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Reverse call:{0}", SocketUtil.GetServiceByPort(port, "tcp", out aliases));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (SocketUtilException exception)Di2015NewLine 13273722Di2015UniqueSeparatorIList<int> myList = new List<int>(new[] {0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5});Di2015NewLineIList<int> moveLeftList = new List<int>(new[] {0, 1, 3, 4});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Go through the original list in order and removeDi2015NewLine// all items from the move left list until you reachDi2015NewLine// the first item that is not going to be moved left.Di2015NewLine//Items removed are already as far left as they can beDi2015NewLine// so they do not need to be moved left and can thereforeDi2015NewLine// be safely removed from the list to be moved.Di2015NewLineforeach (int item in myList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = moveLeftList.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (index >= 0)Di2015NewLine        moveLeftList.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (int item in moveLeftList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int index = myList.IndexOf(item);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Dont move left if it is the first item in the list or it is not in the listDi2015NewLine    if (index <= 0)Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Swap with this item with the one to its leftDi2015NewLine    myList.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine    myList.Insert(index-1, item);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

13278208Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T[,] ToMultidimensionArray<T>(this List<T[]> list, int columns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var array = new T[list.Count, columns];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var source = list[i];Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < columns; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                array[i, j] = source[j];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return array;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
